short_text: The Surah takes its name from the word al-waqi`ah of the very first verse.
text:
The Surah takes its name from the word al-waqi\`ah of the very first verse.

Period of Revelation

According to the chronological order that Hadrat Abdullah bin Abbas has given of the Surahs, first Surah Ta Ha was sent down, then Al-Waqi'ah and then Ash-Shu\`ara'(Suyuti: Al-Itqan). The same sequence has been reported from Ikrimah (Baihaqi: Dala'il an Nubuwwat).

This is supported also by the story that Ibn Hisham has related from Ibn Ishaq about the affirmation of the Faith by Hadrat Umar (may Allah be pleased with him). It says that when Hadarat Umar entered his sister's house, Surah Ta Ha was being recited. Hearing his voice the people of the house hid the pages of the Qur'an. Hadrat Umar first seized his brother-in-law and then his sister rose in defense of her husband, he hit her also and wounded her on the head. When Umar saw blood on his sister, he was sorry for what he had done, and said to her: "Show me the manuscript that you have concealed so that I may see what it contains." The sister said: "You are unclean because of your polytheism: wa anna-hu la yamassu-ha ill-at-tahir : "Only a clean person can touch it." So, Hadrat Umar rose and washed himself, and then took up the manuscript to read it. This shows that Surah Al-Waqi'ah had been sent down by that time for it contains the verse: La yamassu hu ill al
mutahharun ; and it had been established historically that Hadrat Umar embraced Islam after the first migration to Habash, in the fifth year of the Prophethood.

Theme and Subject Matter

Its theme is the Hereafter, Tauhid and refutation of the Makkan disbelievers' suspicions about the Qur'an. What they regarded as utterly incredible was that Resurrection would ever take place, then the entire system of the earth and heavens would be upset, and when all the dead would be resurrected and called to account, after which the righteous would be admitted to Paradise and the wicked cast into Hell. They regarded all this as imaginary, which could not possibly happen in actual fact. In answer to this, it was said: "When the inevitable event will take place, there will be none to belie its happening, nor will anyone have the Power to avert it, nor prove it to, be an unreal happening. At that time all peoples will be divided into three classes: (1) The foremost in rank and position; (2) the common righteous people and (3) those who denied the Hereafter and persisted in disbelief and polytheism and major sins till the last." How these three classes of the people will
be rewarded and punished has been described in detail in vv. 7-56.

Then, in vv. 57-74 arguments have been given, one after the other, to prove the truth of the two basic doctrines of Islam, which the disbelievers were refusing to accept, viz. the doctrines of Tauhid and the Hereafter. In these arguments, apart from every thing else that exists in the earth and heavens, man's attention has been drawn to his own body and to the food that he eats and to the water that he drinks and to the fire on which he cooks his food, and he has been invited to ponder the question : What right do you have to behave independently of, or serve any other than, the God Whose creative power has brought you into being, and Whose provisions sustain you And how can you entertain the idea that after having once brought you into existence He has become so helpless and powerless that He cannot recreate you once again even if he wills to?

Then, in vv. 75-82 their suspicions in respect of the Qur'an have been refuted and they have been made to realize how fortunate they are that instead of deriving any benefit from the great blessing that the Qur'an is, they are treating it with scant attention and have set only this share of theirs in it that they deny it. If one seriously considers this matchless argument that has been presented in two brief sentences about the truth of the Qur'an, one will find in it the same kind of firm and stable system as exists among the stars and planets of the Universe, and the same is the proof of the fact that its Author is the same Being Who has created the Universe. Then the disbelievers have been told that this Book is inscribed in that Writ of Destiny which is beyond the reach of the creatures, as if to say "You think it is brought down by the devils to Muhammad (peace and blessings of Allah be upon him), whereas none but the pure angels has any access to the means by which it
reaches Muhammad (peace and blessings of Allah be upon him) from the well guarded Tablet."

In conclusion, man has been warned, as if to say: "You may brad and boast as you like and may shut your eyes to the truths in your arrogance of independence, but death is enough to open your eyes. At death you become helpless: you cannot save your own parents; you cannot save your children; you cannot save your religious guided and beloved leaders. They all die in front of your vary eyes while you look on helplessly. If there is no supreme power ruling over you, and your this assumption is correct that you are all in all in the world, and there is no God, then why don't you restore to the dying person his soul?Just as you are helpless in this, so it is also beyond your power to stop Allah from calling the people to account and mete out rewards and punishments to them. You may or may not believe it, but every dying person will surely see his own end after death. If he belongs to those nearest to God, he will see the good end meant for them if he be from among the righteous, he
will see the end prepared for the righteous; and if he be from among the deniers of the truth, he will see the end destined for the criminals.
description: The surah that opens by naming the occurrence of the end of time with the title, The Imminent; for all who deny that it is coming will never belie it when finally it happens. It takes its name from verse 1, which mentions “the Imminent Hour” (al-wāqiʿah) i.e., the Day og Resurrection. The surah whose central message is stated in its opening verses: the Day of Judgement is inevitable and it will sort people into the humiliated and the richly rewarded. As in the previous surah, people are divided into three classes: those brought near to God (the best of the believers), those on the right (the ordinary believers), and those on the left (the disbelievers). Ample proof is given of God’s power and consequently His ability to bring about the Resurrection (verse 57 .).The surah is also known as That Which is Coming, The Indisputable Event, The Inevitable, The Inevitable Event, The Occurrence, The Terror

Albanian.verse 56:1: Kur të ndodhë Ngjarja (Dita e Kijametit), -
Albanian.verse 56:2: të ndodhurit e saj askush nuk do ta mohojë,
Albanian.verse 56:3: e cila i ulë (të këqinjtë), i lartëson (të mirët),
Albanian.verse 56:6: dhe shndërrohen në pluhur të shpërndarë,
Albanian.verse 56:7: kur ju njerëzit, do të ndaheni në tri grupe:
Albanian.verse 56:8: ata të lumturit – kush janë të lumturit?!
Albanian.verse 56:9: dhe ata fatkëqinjtë – kush janë fatkëqinjtë?!
Albanian.verse 56:10: Ata që kanë prirë (në besim), do të prijnë (edhe në xhennet),
Albanian.verse 56:12: në kopshtet e xhennetit e të kënaqësisë,
Albanian.verse 56:13: (e këta janë) shumë prej të parëve,
Albanian.verse 56:15: në divanet e stolisura (me gurë të çmueshëm),
Albanian.verse 56:16: të mbështetur në to dhe të kthyer njëri karshi tjetrit;
Albanian.verse 56:17: do t’u sillen rreth tyre (për t’ju shërbyer) djelmoshat përherë të rinj,
Albanian.verse 56:18: me kupa, ibrikë dhe shishe (pijesh) prej burimit rrjedhës,
Albanian.verse 56:19: prej të cilit nuk do t’u dhembë koka dhe nuk do t’u humbë mendja, -
Albanian.verse 56:20: dhe pemë të cilat do t’i zgjedhin vetë,
Albanian.verse 56:21: dhe mish të shpendëve çfarë ju ka ënda.
Albanian.verse 56:22: Në to (xhennete) ka edhe hyrie (të bukura) sy-mëdha,
Albanian.verse 56:24: shpërblim për atë që kanë punuar.
Albanian.verse 56:25: Në ta nuk do të dëgjojnë biseda të kota as fjalë mëkatësh,
Albanian.verse 56:27: E, ata të lumturit – kush janë të lumturit?!
Albanian.verse 56:28: Do të gjenden në mes lotusve (lloj druri) pa gjemba,
Albanian.verse 56:29: dhe babanave të mbushura me frute
Albanian.verse 56:33: të cilat kurrë nuk sosen, as nuk janë të ndaluara (për t’i marrë),
Albanian.verse 56:34: dhe në shtrojet e ngritura (bashkëshorte virtytesh të larta).
Albanian.verse 56:35: Ne i kemi krijuar ato në formë të re,
Albanian.verse 56:36: dhe i kemi bërë ato virxhëresha,
Albanian.verse 56:37: të dashura për bashkëshortët e tyre dhe moshatare me ta –
Albanian.verse 56:39: (këta – të mirët) janë shumë prej (popujve) të lashtëve
Albanian.verse 56:40: e shumë edhe prej të mëvonshmëve.
Albanian.verse 56:41: E, ata fatkëqinjtë – cilët janë fatkëqinjtë?!
Albanian.verse 56:42: Ata (që) do të jenë në frymën e zjarrit dhe të ujit të vëluar
Albanian.verse 56:43: dhe në hijen e tymit të zi,
Albanian.verse 56:44: në të cilën nuk do të ketë freski as kurrfarë të mire.
Albanian.verse 56:45: Ata, para kësaj (në këtë botë), kanë jetuar në luks,
Albanian.verse 56:46: dhe me këmbëngulje bënin mëkate të rënda,
Albanian.verse 56:47: dhe thonin: “Vallë, pasi të vdesim e të bëhemi tokë e eshtra, a, me të vërtetë, do të ringjallemi,
Albanian.verse 56:48: vallë, edhe të parët tonë të lashtë?!
Albanian.verse 56:49: Thuaju (o Muhammed!): “Me të vërtetë, edhe të parët edhe të mbramët, -
Albanian.verse 56:50: do të tubohen në një kohë (të caktuar), të ditës së njohur,
Albanian.verse 56:51: dhe, atëherë ju, o të humbur, që përgënjeshtroni ringjalljen,
Albanian.verse 56:52: me siguri do të hani nga druri i zekkumit,
Albanian.verse 56:53: dhe me te do të mbushni stomakun,
Albanian.verse 56:54: e pastaj në të, do të pini ujë të vëluar,
Albanian.verse 56:55: dhe do të pini ashtu siç pin devja e etshme,
Albanian.verse 56:56: kjo (që u përmend) do të jetë pozita e tyre në Ditën e Kijametit!
Albanian.verse 56:57: Ne, u krijuam juve – e, sikur të kishit besuar!
Albanian.verse 56:58: A po shihni ju farën (spermën) që e hedhni (injektoni)
Albanian.verse 56:59: a po e krijoni (dhe zhvilloni njeriun ju), apo Ne jemi krijues?
Albanian.verse 56:60: Ne e caktojmë vdekjen tuaj dhe askush nuk mund të na pengojë,
Albanian.verse 56:61: që t’ju ndryshojmë figurën tuaj dhe t’ju krijojmë në figurën çfarë ju nuk e dini.
Albanian.verse 56:62: Ju, madje, e dini krijimin e parë, e pse nuk po këshilloheni?!
Albanian.verse 56:63: A shihni atë që po e mbillni?
Albanian.verse 56:64: A mos ju jepni, që prej saj të mbijë (bima), apo Ne japim që të mbijë ajo?
Albanian.verse 56:65: Nëse duam Ne, Ne do ta thërrmojmë atë (bimën) dhe ju do të çuditeni,
Albanian.verse 56:66: (dhe, do të thoni): “Ne, me të vërtetë, jemi të dëmtuar,
Albanian.verse 56:68: A po e shihni (atë) ujë që e pini –
Albanian.verse 56:69: a mos e lëshoni ju prej réve apo Ne e lëshojmë?!
Albanian.verse 56:70: Nëse duam Ne, Ne do ta bëjmë atë të njelmët – e përse nuk falenderoheni?!
Albanian.verse 56:71: A po e shihni atë zjarr, që e ndezni –
Albanian.verse 56:72: a mos e keni bërë ju drurin e saj, apo Ne e kemi bërë?!
Albanian.verse 56:73: Ne, e kemi bërë zjarrin përkujtues (të zjarrit të skëterrës) dhe që t’u sjellë dobi nevojtarëve,
Albanian.verse 56:74: andaj lavdëroje emrin e Zotit tënd të Madhërueshëm!
Albanian.verse 56:75: Dhe, betohu në çastin e perëndimit të yjeve,
Albanian.verse 56:76: e ky është, betim i madh, nëse e dini, -
Albanian.verse 56:77: ky (shpjeguesi i këtyre), është, me të vërtetë, Kur’ani i nderuar,
Albanian.verse 56:79: le ta prekin atë vetëm të pastërtit –
Albanian.verse 56:80: (ai është) Shpallje prej Zotit të Gjithësisë.
Albanian.verse 56:81: E, vallë, ju këtë fjalë (Kur’anin) nuk e përfillni?
Albanian.verse 56:82: dhe, në vend të mirënjohjes për furnizimin e dhuruar, që u është dhënë – ju, në të vërtetë, po e përgënjeshtroni atë.
Albanian.verse 56:83: E, përse kur t’ju vie shpirti në fyt,
Albanian.verse 56:84: dhe kur ju atëherë e shikoni atë,
Albanian.verse 56:85: e ne jemi më afër atij se ju, por ju nuk shihni, -
Albanian.verse 56:86: e sikur të ishit ju të fuqishëm (e nuk sundon tjetërkush)
Albanian.verse 56:87: atëherë do t’ia kthenit (shpirtin atij), nëse thoni të vërtetën?
Albanian.verse 56:88: Dhe, nëse është (ai që është në agoni) nga ata që janë afër te Perëndia –
Albanian.verse 56:89: (për te ka) komoditet, mëshirë dhe furnizim të madh dhe kopshtet e dhuntive!
Albanian.verse 56:90: E, nëse është (ai që është në agoni) nga të lumturit –
Albanian.verse 56:91: e, përshëndetje për ty nga ata që janë të lumtur!
Albanian.verse 56:92: E, nëse është (ai që është në agoni) nga ata që kanë përgënjeshtruar – të humburve –
Albanian.verse 56:93: ata do të gostiten me ujë të vëluar –
Albanian.verse 56:94: dhe përcëllim në zjarr të xhehennemit.
Albanian.verse 56:95: Në të vërtetë, e gjithë kjo, është e vërtetë e saktë.
Albanian.verse 56:96: Andaj lavdëroje emrin e Zotit tënd të Madhërueshëm!

Amharic.verse 56:5: ተራራዎችም መፍፈርፈርን በተፈረፈሩ ጊዜ (እንደተፈጨ ዱቄት በኾኑ ጊዜ)፡፡
Amharic.verse 56:8: የቀኝ ጓዶችም ምን (የተከበሩ) የቀኝ ጓዶች ናቸው፡፡
Amharic.verse 56:9: የግራ ጓዶችም ምን (የተዋረዱ) የግራ ጓዶች ናቸው፡፡
Amharic.verse 56:16: በእርሷ ላይ የተመቻቹና ፊት ለፊት የተቅጣጩ ሲኾኑ፡፡
Amharic.verse 56:17: በእነርሱ ላይ ሁል ጊዜ የማያረጁ ወጣቶች ልጆች ይዘዋወራሉ፡፡
Amharic.verse 56:18: ከጠጅ ምንጭም በብርጭቆዎችና በኩስኩስቶች በጽዋም (በእነርሱ ላይ ይዝዞራሉ)፡፡
Amharic.verse 56:24: በዚያ ይሠሩት በነበሩት ምክንያት ዋጋ ይኾን ዘንድ (ይህንን አደረግንላቸው)፡፡
Amharic.verse 56:41: የግራ ጓደኞችም ምንኛ (የተዋረዱ) የግራ ጓዶች! ናቸው፡፡
Amharic.verse 56:42: በመርዛም ነፋስ በጣም በፈላ ውሃም ውስጥ ናቸው፡፡
Amharic.verse 56:47: ይሉም ነበሩ፡- «በሞትንና ዐፈር፣ ዐጥንቶችም በኾን ጊዜ እኛ በእርግጥ የምንቀሰቀስ ነን?
Amharic.verse 56:59: እናንተ ትፈጥሩታላችሁን? ወይስ እኛ ፈጣሪዎቹን ነን?
Amharic.verse 56:60: እኛ ሞትን (ጊዜውን) በመካከላችሁ ወሰንን፡፡ እኛም ተሸናፊዎች አይደለንም፡፡
Amharic.verse 56:61: ብጤዎቻችሁን በመለወጥና በዚያ በማታውቁትም (ቅርጽ) እናንተን በመፍጠር ላይ (አንሸነፍም)፡፡
Amharic.verse 56:64: እናንተ ታበቅሉታላችሁን? ወይስ እኛ አብቃዮቹ ነን?
Amharic.verse 56:65: ብነሻ ኖሮ ደረቅ ስብርብር ባደረግነውና የምትደነቁም በኾናችሁ ነበር፡፡
Amharic.verse 56:69: እናንተ ከደመናው አወረዳችሁትን? ወይስ እኛ አውራጆቹ ነን?
Amharic.verse 56:70: ብንሻ ኖሮ መርጋጋ ባደረግነው ነበር፡፡ አታመሰግኑምን?
Amharic.verse 56:72: እናንተ ዛፏን ፈጠራችሁን? ወይስ እኛ ፈጣሪዎችዋ ነን?
Amharic.verse 56:85: እኛም ግን አታዩም እንጅ ከእናንተ ይልቅ ወደእርሱ የቀረብን ስንኾን፡፡
Amharic.verse 56:87: እውነተኞች እንደ ኾናችሁ (ነፍሲቱን ወደ አካሉ) ለምን አትመልሷትም፡፡
Amharic.verse 56:89: (ለእርሱ) ዕረፍት፣ መልካም ሲሳይም፣ የመጠቀሚያ ገነትም አልለው፡፡
Amharic.verse 56:91: ከቀኝ ጓዶች ስለ ኾንክ ላንተ ሰላም አልለህ (ይባላል)፡፡

Arabic.verse 56:47: (َنوُثوُعْبَمَل اَّنِإَأ اًماَظِعَو اًباَرُت اَّنُكَو اَنْتِم اَذِئَأ َنوُلوُقَي اوُناَكَو

Azerbaijani.verse 56:2: onun qopduğunu heç kəs dana bilməz.
Azerbaijani.verse 56:3: O, bəzilərini alçaldacaq, bəzilərini də ucaldacaqdır.
Azerbaijani.verse 56:6: və ətrafa səpələnmiş toz-torpağa döndüyü zaman,
Azerbaijani.verse 56:8: Sağ tərəf sahibləri. Nə xoşbəxtdir sağ tərəf sahibləri!
Azerbaijani.verse 56:9: Sol tərəf sahibləri. Nə bədbəxtdir sol tərəf sahibləri!
Azerbaijani.verse 56:10: Xeyirxah işlərdə öndə gedənlər, Cənnətdə də öndədirlər!
Azerbaijani.verse 56:17: Onların ətrafında həmişəcavan xidmətçi oğlanlar fırlanacaqlar;
Azerbaijani.verse 56:18: çeşmə şərabı ilə dolu badələr, bardaqlar və qədəhlərlə –
Azerbaijani.verse 56:19: ondan başları ağrımaz və məst olmazlar,
Azerbaijani.verse 56:21: və istədikləri quş əti ilə hərlənəcəklər.
Azerbaijani.verse 56:23: sədəf içində saxlanılmış mirvariyə bənzər hurilər.
Azerbaijani.verse 56:24: Bu, onların etdikləri əməllərin mükafatı olacaq.
Azerbaijani.verse 56:25: Onlar orada nə boş söz, nə də günaha səbəb olan söhbət eşidəcəklər.
Azerbaijani.verse 56:27: Sağ tərəf sahibləri. Nə xoşbəxtdir sağ tərəf sahibləri!
Azerbaijani.verse 56:29: meyvələri salxım-salxım asılmış banan ağacları altında,
Azerbaijani.verse 56:33: tükənməz və qadağan edilməyən meyvələr içində
Azerbaijani.verse 56:35: Biz Cənnətdəki qadınları yeni biçimdə yaradacağıq.
Azerbaijani.verse 56:41: Sol tərəf sahibləri. Nə bədbəxtdir sol tərəf sahibləri!
Azerbaijani.verse 56:42: Onlar qızmar yel və qaynar su içində,
Azerbaijani.verse 56:44: Bu duman nə sərin, nə də xoşagələndir.
Azerbaijani.verse 56:45: Onlar bundan əvvəl cah-calal içində idilər,
Azerbaijani.verse 56:47: və deyirdilər: “Məgər biz ölüb torpaq və sür-sümük olduqdan sonra yenidənmi dirildiləcəyik?
Azerbaijani.verse 56:49: De: “Şübhəsiz ki, əvvəlkilər də, sonrakılar da,
Azerbaijani.verse 56:50: bəlli bir günün müəyyən vaxtında mütləq toplanılacaqlar.
Azerbaijani.verse 56:51: Sonra, siz ey doğru yoldan azanlar, haqqı yalan sayanlar!
Azerbaijani.verse 56:55: Siz onu susamış xəstə dəvələr kimi içəcəksiniz”.
Azerbaijani.verse 56:57: Sizi Biz yaratdıq. Bəs nə üçün dirildiləcəyinizi təsdiq etmirsiniz?
Azerbaijani.verse 56:60: Sizin aranızda ölümü Biz müəyyən etdik və heç nə Bizim qarşımızı ala bilməz.
Azerbaijani.verse 56:61: Sizi bənzərləriniz ilə əvəz etməyə və sizi özünüz bilmədiyiniz başqa bir şəkildə yaratmağa Bizə mane olan tapılmaz.
Azerbaijani.verse 56:62: Siz ilk yaradılışı bilirsiniz. Bəs nə üçün dirildiləcəyiniz barədə düşünmürsünüz?
Azerbaijani.verse 56:65: Əgər Biz istəsəydik, onu bir saman çöpünə döndərər, siz də heyrətə gələrdiniz,
Azerbaijani.verse 56:69: Onu buluddan siz endirirsiniz, yoxsa Biz?
Azerbaijani.verse 56:70: Əgər istəsəydik, onu acı edərdik. Bəs nə üçün şükür etmirsiniz?
Azerbaijani.verse 56:72: Onun ağacını siz yaradırsınız, yoxsa Biz?
Azerbaijani.verse 56:73: Biz onu Cəhənnəmi yada salmaq və müsafirlərin istifadəsi üçün yaratdıq.
Azerbaijani.verse 56:74: Elə isə Ulu Rəbbinin adına təriflər de!
Azerbaijani.verse 56:76: Kaş bunun, doğrudan da, böyük bir and olduğunu biləydiniz.
Azerbaijani.verse 56:80: O, aləmlərin Rəbbi tərəfindən nazil edilmişdir.
Azerbaijani.verse 56:82: Sizə verilən ruziyə şükür etməyi, onu yalan saymaqla yerinə yetirirsiniz?
Azerbaijani.verse 56:84: həmin an siz can verən adama baxırsınız.
Azerbaijani.verse 56:85: Biz ona sizdən daha yaxın oluruq, siz isə bunu görmürsünüz.
Azerbaijani.verse 56:86: Madam ki siz iddianıza görə haqq-hesab olunmayacaqsınız
Azerbaijani.verse 56:87: və doğru danışanlarsınız, onda, o canı geri qaytarın?
Azerbaijani.verse 56:88: Amma əgər o, Allaha yaxın olanlardandırsa,
Azerbaijani.verse 56:89: onda rəhmətə, gözəl ruziyə və Nəim bağına yetişər.
Azerbaijani.verse 56:91: ona: “Sağ tərəf sahiblərindən sənə salam olsun!”– deyiləcəkdir.
Azerbaijani.verse 56:92: Yox əgər o, haqqı yalan sayanlardan və doğru yoldan azanlardandırsa,
Azerbaijani.verse 56:95: Həqiqətən, bu, şübhə doğurmayan bir həqiqətdir.
Azerbaijani.verse 56:96: Elə isə Ulu Rəbbinin adına təriflər de!

Bengali.verse 56:3: এটা নীচু করে দেবে, সমুন্নত করে দেবে।
Bengali.verse 56:5: এবং পর্বতমালা ভেঙ্গে চুরমার হয়ে যাবে।
Bengali.verse 56:6: অতঃপর তা হয়ে যাবে উৎক্ষিপ্ত ধূলিকণা।
Bengali.verse 56:7: এবং তোমরা তিনভাবে বিভক্ত হয়ে পড়বে।
Bengali.verse 56:8: যারা ডান দিকে, কত ভাগ্যবান তারা।
Bengali.verse 56:9: এবং যারা বামদিকে, কত হতভাগা তারা।
Bengali.verse 56:16: তারা তাতে হেলান দিয়ে বসবে পরস্পর মুখোমুখি হয়ে।
Bengali.verse 56:17: তাদের কাছে ঘোরাফেরা করবে চির কিশোরেরা।
Bengali.verse 56:18: পানপাত্র কুঁজা ও খাঁটি সূরাপূর্ণ পেয়ালা হাতে নিয়ে,
Bengali.verse 56:19: যা পান করলে তাদের শিরঃপীড়া হবে না এবং বিকারগ্রস্ত ও হবে না।
Bengali.verse 56:24: তারা যা কিছু করত, তার পুরস্কারস্বরূপ।
Bengali.verse 56:25: তারা তথায় অবান্তর ও কোন খারাপ কথা শুনবে না।
Bengali.verse 56:27: যারা ডান দিকে থাকবে, তারা কত ভাগ্যবান।
Bengali.verse 56:33: যা শেষ হবার নয় এবং নিষিদ্ধ ও নয়,
Bengali.verse 56:35: আমি জান্নাতী রমণীগণকে বিশেষরূপে সৃষ্টি করেছি।
Bengali.verse 56:39: তাদের একদল হবে পূর্ববর্তীদের মধ্য থেকে।
Bengali.verse 56:41: বামপার্শ্বস্থ লোক, কত না হতভাগা তারা।
Bengali.verse 56:42: তারা থাকবে প্রখর বাষ্পে এবং উত্তপ্ত পানিতে,
Bengali.verse 56:44: যা শীতল নয় এবং আরামদায়কও নয়।
Bengali.verse 56:46: তারা সদাসর্বদা ঘোরতর পাপকর্মে ডুবে থাকত।
Bengali.verse 56:47: তারা বলতঃ আমরা যখন মরে অস্থি ও মৃত্তিকায় পরিণত হয়ে যাব, তখনও কি পুনরুত্থিত হব?
Bengali.verse 56:50: সবাই একত্রিত হবে এক নির্দিষ্ট দিনের নির্দিষ্ট সময়ে।
Bengali.verse 56:52: তোমরা অবশ্যই ভক্ষণ করবে যাক্কুম বৃক্ষ থেকে,
Bengali.verse 56:53: অতঃপর তা দ্বারা উদর পূর্ণ করবে,
Bengali.verse 56:54: অতঃপর তার উপর পান করবে উত্তপ্ত পানি।
Bengali.verse 56:56: কেয়ামতের দিন এটাই হবে তাদের আপ্যায়ন।
Bengali.verse 56:57: আমি সৃষ্টি করেছি তোমাদেরকে। অতঃপর কেন তোমরা তা সত্য বলে বিশ্বাস কর না।
Bengali.verse 56:58: তোমরা কি ভেবে দেখেছ, তোমাদের বীর্যপাত সম্পর্কে।
Bengali.verse 56:59: তোমরা তাকে সৃষ্টি কর, না আমি সৃষ্টি করি?
Bengali.verse 56:60: আমি তোমাদের মৃত্যুকাল নির্ধারিত করেছি এবং আমি অক্ষম নই।
Bengali.verse 56:61: এ ব্যাপারে যে, তোমাদের পরিবর্তে তোমাদের মত লোককে নিয়ে আসি এবং তোমাদেরকে এমন করে দেই, যা তোমরা জান না।
Bengali.verse 56:62: তোমরা অবগত হয়েছ প্রথম সৃষ্টি সম্পর্কে, তবে তোমরা অনুধাবন কর না কেন?
Bengali.verse 56:63: তোমরা যে বীজ বপন কর, সে সম্পর্কে ভেবে দেখেছ কি?
Bengali.verse 56:64: তোমরা তাকে উৎপন্ন কর, না আমি উৎপন্নকারী ?
Bengali.verse 56:65: আমি ইচ্ছা করলে তাকে খড়কুটা করে দিতে পারি, অতঃপর হয়ে যাবে তোমরা বিস্ময়াবিষ্ট।
Bengali.verse 56:66: বলবেঃ আমরা তো ঋণের চাপে পড়ে গেলাম;
Bengali.verse 56:67: বরং আমরা হূত সর্বস্ব হয়ে পড়লাম।
Bengali.verse 56:68: তোমরা যে পানি পান কর, সে সম্পর্কে ভেবে দেখেছ কি?
Bengali.verse 56:69: তোমরা তা মেঘ থেকে নামিয়ে আন, না আমি বর্ষন করি?
Bengali.verse 56:70: আমি ইচ্ছা করলে তাকে লোনা করে দিতে পারি, অতঃপর তোমরা কেন কৃতজ্ঞতা প্রকাশ কর না?
Bengali.verse 56:71: তোমরা যে অগ্নি প্রজ্জ্বলিত কর, সে সম্পর্কে ভেবে দেখেছ কি?
Bengali.verse 56:72: তোমরা কি এর বৃক্ষ সৃষ্টি করেছ, না আমি সৃষ্টি করেছি ?
Bengali.verse 56:73: আমি সেই বৃক্ষকে করেছি স্মরণিকা এবং মরুবাসীদের জন্য সামগ্রী।
Bengali.verse 56:74: অতএব, আপনি আপনার মহান পালনকর্তার নামে পবিত্রতা ঘোষণা করুন।
Bengali.verse 56:75: অতএব, আমি তারকারাজির অস্তাচলের শপথ করছি,
Bengali.verse 56:76: নিশ্চয় এটা এক মহা শপথ-যদি তোমরা জানতে।
Bengali.verse 56:79: যারা পাক-পবিত্র, তারা ব্যতীত অন্য কেউ একে স্পর্শ করবে না।
Bengali.verse 56:81: তবুও কি তোমরা এই বাণীর প্রতি শৈথিল্য পদর্শন করবে?
Bengali.verse 56:82: এবং একে মিথ্যা বলাকেই তোমরা তোমাদের ভূমিকায় পরিণত করবে?
Bengali.verse 56:83: অতঃপর যখন কারও প্রাণ কন্ঠাগত হয়।
Bengali.verse 56:85: তখন আমি তোমাদের অপেক্ষা তার অধিক নিকটে থাকি; কিন্তু তোমরা দেখ না।
Bengali.verse 56:86: যদি তোমাদের হিসাব-কিতাব না হওয়াই ঠিক হয়,
Bengali.verse 56:87: তবে তোমরা এই আত্মাকে ফিরাও না কেন, যদি তোমরা সত্যবাদী হও ?
Bengali.verse 56:89: তবে তার জন্যে আছে সুখ, উত্তম রিযিক এবং নেয়ামতে ভরা উদ্যান।
Bengali.verse 56:90: আর যদি সে ডান পার্শ্বস্থদের একজন হয়,
Bengali.verse 56:91: তবে তাকে বলা হবেঃ তোমার জন্যে ডানপার্শ্বসস্থদের পক্ষ থেকে সালাম।
Bengali.verse 56:92: আর যদি সে পথভ্রষ্ট মিথ্যারোপকারীদের একজন হয়,
Bengali.verse 56:93: তবে তার আপ্যায়ন হবে উত্তপ্ত পানি দ্বারা।
Bengali.verse 56:96: অতএব, আপনি আপনার মহান পালনকর্তার নামে পবিত্রতা ঘোষণা করুন।

Berber Amazigh.verse 56:1: Mara d tas, tin ara d iasen,

Berber Amazigh.verse 56:27: At uyeffus, at uyeffus, d acu ten?
Berber Amazigh.verse 56:41: At uzelmav, at uzelmav, d acu ten?

Berber Amazigh.verse 56:50: ad ppujemmlen ar temlilit n wass ipwassnen".

Berber Amazigh.verse 56:59: D kunwi ip ixelqen, ne$ d Nekwni ay d ixellaqen?
Berber Amazigh.verse 56:60: Nseyya tameppant garawen. Ur a£ izeggwir yiwen
Berber Amazigh.verse 56:61: iwakken a Nerr deg umkan nnwen wid i kwen icban; u kunwi, a kwen Nexleq d ayen ur tessinem.
Berber Amazigh.verse 56:62: Ni$ tesnem axlaq amenzu, lemmer tesmektayem!
Berber Amazigh.verse 56:64: D kunwi i t ikerzen, ne$ d Nekwni ay d imekrazen?
Berber Amazigh.verse 56:65: Ma ihwa ya£, a t Nerr d uêvim, d$a a kwen tekkat lwehma:
Berber Amazigh.verse 56:69: D kunwi iten id isse$layen seg usigna, ne$ d Nekwni?
Berber Amazigh.verse 56:70: Ma ihwa ya£, a ten Nerr d imeô$anen. A lemmer tesnemmiren!
Berber Amazigh.verse 56:71: Twalam times i tesskarem s uêukku?
Berber Amazigh.verse 56:72: D kunwi i s d ixelqen ttjuô is, ne$ d Nekwni ay d Ixellaqen?
Berber Amazigh.verse 56:73: D Nekwni i p Irran d asmekti, u d lâafia i wid ineêwwaoen.
Berber Amazigh.verse 56:74: Sbuccaâ, s ccekôan, isem n Mass ik, Ameqwôaêan!
Berber Amazigh.verse 56:75: Ih, gulle$ seg wanda llan itran!
Berber Amazigh.verse 56:76: U, tagi, lemmer a ppeéôem, ard tagallit tameqwôaêant!
Berber Amazigh.verse 56:79: Ur t pnalen, siwa wid zeddigen.
Berber Amazigh.verse 56:81: S usali agi, amendeô ma a ppiéidem?
Berber Amazigh.verse 56:85: Nekwni, sennig wen, i Neqôeb $uôes, maca, ur twalam ara.
Berber Amazigh.verse 56:86: Xas ma ur tellim d wid ur nepwalas,
Berber Amazigh.verse 56:87: erret p id, ma tessawalem tidep!
Berber Amazigh.verse 56:89: ihi, abeêri, laâîeô, di leonan n ssuâada.
Berber Amazigh.verse 56:96: Sbuccaâ, s ccekôan, isem n Mass ik Ameqwôaêan!

Bosnian.verse 56:3: neke će poniziti, a neke uzvisiti;
Bosnian.verse 56:5: i brda se u komadiće zdrobe,
Bosnian.verse 56:9: i oni nesretni – ko su nesretni?!
Bosnian.verse 56:13: biće ih mnogo od naroda drevnih,
Bosnian.verse 56:16: jedni prema drugima na njima će naslonjeni biti;
Bosnian.verse 56:18: sa čašama i ibricima i peharom punim pića iz izvora tekućeg –
Bosnian.verse 56:19: od koga ih glava neće boljeti i zbog kojeg neće pamet izgubiti –
Bosnian.verse 56:20: i voćem koje će sami birati,
Bosnian.verse 56:21: i mesom ptičijim kakvo budu željeli.
Bosnian.verse 56:22: U njima će biti i hurije očiju krupnih,
Bosnian.verse 56:24: kao nagrada za ono što su činili.
Bosnian.verse 56:25: U njima neće slušati prazne besjede ni govor grješni,
Bosnian.verse 56:27: A onî sretni – ko su sretni?!
Bosnian.verse 56:28: Biće među lotosovim drvećem bez bodlji,
Bosnian.verse 56:33: kojeg će uvijek imati i koje neće zabranjeno biti,
Bosnian.verse 56:35: Stvaranjem novim Mi ćemo hurije stvoriti
Bosnian.verse 56:37: milim muževima njihovim, i godina istih
Bosnian.verse 56:39: biće ih mnogo od naroda drevnih,
Bosnian.verse 56:41: A onî nesretni – ko su nesretni?!
Bosnian.verse 56:42: Oni će biti u vatri užarenoj i vodi ključaloj
Bosnian.verse 56:44: u kojoj neće biti svježine ni ikakve dobrine.
Bosnian.verse 56:45: Oni su prije toga raskošnim životom živjeli
Bosnian.verse 56:47: i govorili: "Zar kada umremo i zemlja i kosti postanemo – zar ćemo zbilja biti oživljeni,
Bosnian.verse 56:50: u određeno vrijeme, jednog određenog dana biće sakupljeni,
Bosnian.verse 56:51: i tada ćete vi, o zabludjeli, koji poričete oživljenje,
Bosnian.verse 56:54: pa zatim na to ključalu vodu piti,
Bosnian.verse 56:55: poput kamila koje ne mogu žeđ ugasiti";
Bosnian.verse 56:56: to će na onome svijetu biti gošćenje njihovo!
Bosnian.verse 56:57: Mi vas stvaramo – pa zašto ne povjerujete?
Bosnian.verse 56:58: Kažite vi Meni: da li sjemenu koje ubacujete
Bosnian.verse 56:59: vi oblik dajete ili Mi to činimo?
Bosnian.verse 56:60: Mi određujemo kada će ko od vas umrijeti, i niko nas ne može spriječiti
Bosnian.verse 56:61: da likove vaše izmijenimo i da vas iznova u likovima koje vi ne poznajete stvorimo.
Bosnian.verse 56:62: Poznato vam je kako ste prvi put stvoreni, pa zašto se ne urazumite?
Bosnian.verse 56:63: Kažite vi Meni: šta biva sa onim što posijete?
Bosnian.verse 56:64: Da li mu vi dajete snagu da niče, ili to Mi činimo?
Bosnian.verse 56:65: Ako hoćemo možemo ga u suho rastinje pretvoriti, pa biste se snebivali:
Bosnian.verse 56:68: Kažite vi Meni: vodu koju pijete –
Bosnian.verse 56:69: da li je vi ili Mi iz oblaka spuštamo?
Bosnian.verse 56:70: Ako želimo, možemo je slanom učiniti – pa zašto niste zahvalni?
Bosnian.verse 56:71: Kažite vi Meni: vatru koju palite –
Bosnian.verse 56:72: da li drvo za nju vi ili Mi stvaramo?
Bosnian.verse 56:73: Mi činimo da ona podsjeća i da bude korisna onima koji konače;
Bosnian.verse 56:75: I kunem se časom kad se zvijezde gube –
Bosnian.verse 56:76: a to je, da znate, zakletva velika,
Bosnian.verse 56:79: dodirnuti ga smiju samo oni koji su čisti,
Bosnian.verse 56:80: on je Objava od Gospodara svjetova.
Bosnian.verse 56:82: i umjesto zahvalnosti što vam je hrana darovana – vi u njega ne vjerujete?
Bosnian.verse 56:83: A zašto vi kad duša do guše dopre,
Bosnian.verse 56:84: i kad vi budete tada gledali,
Bosnian.verse 56:85: a Mi smo mu bliži od vas, ali vi ne vidite,
Bosnian.verse 56:86: zašto je onda kad niste u tuđoj vlasti
Bosnian.verse 56:88: I ako bude jedan od onih koji su Allahu bliski –
Bosnian.verse 56:89: udobnost i opskrba lijepa i džennetske blagodati njemu!
Bosnian.verse 56:90: A ako bude jedan od onih koji su sretni –
Bosnian.verse 56:91: pa, pozdrav tebi od onih koji su sretni!
Bosnian.verse 56:92: A ako bude jedan od onih koji su poricali i u zabludi ostali,
Bosnian.verse 56:95: Sama je istina, zbilja, sve ovo –
Bosnian.verse 56:96: zato hvali ime Gospodara svoga Veličanstvenog!

Bulgarian.verse 56:2: никой не ще възпре неговото настъпване -
Bulgarian.verse 56:4: Когато земята се разтърси в трус
Bulgarian.verse 56:5: и планините се разломят на отломки,
Bulgarian.verse 56:7: вие ще станете на три групи:
Bulgarian.verse 56:8: едни - отдясно, - какво ще е за тези отдясно?;
Bulgarian.verse 56:9: и други - отляво, - какво ще е за тези отляво?;
Bulgarian.verse 56:10: и първенците [в богобоязливостта], - те са първенците [в Рая]
Bulgarian.verse 56:18: бокали и кани, и чаши [вино] от извор.
Bulgarian.verse 56:19: Не ще ги боли глава от това и не ще губят ум.
Bulgarian.verse 56:22: И ще имат хубавици с големи очи,
Bulgarian.verse 56:25: Не ще слушат там нито празнословие, нито подбуда към грях,
Bulgarian.verse 56:27: А онези отдясно... Какво ще е за онези отдясно?
Bulgarian.verse 56:41: А онези отляво... Какво ще е за онези отляво?
Bulgarian.verse 56:42: Сред изгарящ вятър и вряща вода,
Bulgarian.verse 56:45: Те живееха сред разкош преди това.
Bulgarian.verse 56:47: И казваха: “Нима като умрем и станем пръст и кости, нима наистина ще бъдем възкресени?
Bulgarian.verse 56:48: А нима и древните ни предци?”
Bulgarian.verse 56:50: наистина ще бъдат събрани по време на знайния Ден.”
Bulgarian.verse 56:52: наистина ще ядете от дървото Зокум
Bulgarian.verse 56:53: и ще си пълните от него стомасите,
Bulgarian.verse 56:54: и ще пиете след това от врящата вода.
Bulgarian.verse 56:55: Ще пиете, както пият прежаднелите камили.
Bulgarian.verse 56:56: Това е угощението им в Съдния ден.
Bulgarian.verse 56:57: Ние ви сътворихме. Защо тогава не повярвате?
Bulgarian.verse 56:58: Не виждате ли семето, което изливате?
Bulgarian.verse 56:59: Вие ли го сътворявате, или Ние сме Твореца?
Bulgarian.verse 56:60: Ние отредихме смъртта за вас и не ще бъдем възпрени
Bulgarian.verse 56:61: да променим такива като вас и да ви пресъздадем в нещо, което не ви е познато.
Bulgarian.verse 56:62: И узнахте вече първото сътворяване. Не ще ли се поучите?
Bulgarian.verse 56:63: И не виждате ли какво сеете?
Bulgarian.verse 56:64: Вие ли го карате да расте, или Ние го караме?
Bulgarian.verse 56:65: Ако пожелаехме, бихме го сторили на сухи съчки и щяхте да останете слисани:
Bulgarian.verse 56:68: И не виждате ли водата, която пиете?
Bulgarian.verse 56:69: Вие ли я изсипвате от облака или Ние я изсипваме?
Bulgarian.verse 56:70: Ако пожелаехме, бихме я сторили солена, защо тогава не сте признателни?
Bulgarian.verse 56:71: Не виждате ли огъня, който разпалвате?
Bulgarian.verse 56:72: Вие ли създавате дървото за него, или Ние сме Създателя?
Bulgarian.verse 56:73: Ние го сторихме за поучение и за ползване от онези, които се нуждаят.
Bulgarian.verse 56:74: Затова прославяй името на твоя Господ, Превеликия!
Bulgarian.verse 56:75: Но не, кълна се в залезите на звездите -
Bulgarian.verse 56:76: а това е клетва - ако знаете - велика,
Bulgarian.verse 56:82: И [вместо благодарност] за препитанието вие го взимате за лъжа?
Bulgarian.verse 56:83: И когато [душата на умиращия] стигне гърлото,
Bulgarian.verse 56:85: а Ние сме по-близо до него от вас, ала не виждате -
Bulgarian.verse 56:86: и защо, ако не ще бъдете съдени,
Bulgarian.verse 56:87: не я върнете обратно, ако говорите истината?
Bulgarian.verse 56:88: И ако [умиращият] е от приближените [на Аллах],
Bulgarian.verse 56:89: тогава - покой и удовлетворение, и Градината на блаженството.
Bulgarian.verse 56:90: А ако е от онези отдясно,
Bulgarian.verse 56:91: тогава [ще му се каже]: “Мир на теб, защото си от онези отдясно!”
Bulgarian.verse 56:92: А ако е от отричащите, заблудените,
Bulgarian.verse 56:96: Затова прославяй името на твоя Господ, Превеликия!

Chinese.verse 56:1: 当那件大事发生的时候，
Chinese.verse 56:2: 没有任何人否认其发生。
Chinese.verse 56:3: 那件大事将是能使人降级，能使人升级的；
Chinese.verse 56:7: 而你们分为三等的时候。
Chinese.verse 56:8: 幸福者，幸福者是何等的人？
Chinese.verse 56:9: 薄命者，薄命者是何等的人？
Chinese.verse 56:10: 最先行善者，是最先入乐园的人，
Chinese.verse 56:11: 这等人，确是蒙主眷顾的。
Chinese.verse 56:12: 他们将在恩泽的乐园中。
Chinese.verse 56:17: 长生不老的僮仆，轮流着服待他们，
Chinese.verse 56:18: 捧着盏和壶，与满杯的醴泉；
Chinese.verse 56:19: 他们不因那醴泉而头痛，也不酩酊。
Chinese.verse 56:20: 他们有自己所选择的水果，
Chinese.verse 56:22: 还有白皙的、美目的妻子，
Chinese.verse 56:23: 好象藏在蚌壳里的珍珠一样。
Chinese.verse 56:24: 那是为了报酬他们的善行。
Chinese.verse 56:25: 他们在乐园里，听不到恶言和谎话，
Chinese.verse 56:26: 但听到说：祝你们平安！祝你们平安！
Chinese.verse 56:27: 幸福者，幸福者是何等的人？
Chinese.verse 56:28: 他们享受无刺的酸枣树，
Chinese.verse 56:33: 四时不绝，可以随意摘食；
Chinese.verse 56:38: 这些都是幸福者所享受的。
Chinese.verse 56:41: 薄命者，薄命者是何等的人？
Chinese.verse 56:47: 他们常说：难道我们死后，已变成尘土和枯骨的时候，我们必定要复活吗？
Chinese.verse 56:48: 连我们的祖先也要复活吗？
Chinese.verse 56:50: 在一个著名的日期和特定时间必定要被集合。
Chinese.verse 56:51: 然后迷误的、否认复活的人们啊！
Chinese.verse 56:52: 你们必定食攒（木+苦）木的果实，
Chinese.verse 56:55: 象害消渴病的骆驼饮凉水一样。
Chinese.verse 56:56: 这是他们在报应之日所受的款待。
Chinese.verse 56:57: 我曾创造你们，你们怎么不信复活呢？
Chinese.verse 56:58: 你们告诉我吧！你们所射的精液，
Chinese.verse 56:59: 究竟是你们把它造成人呢？还是我把它造成人呢？
Chinese.verse 56:60: 我曾将死亡分配给你们，任何人不能阻挠我，
Chinese.verse 56:61: 不让我改变你们的品性，而使你们生长在你们所不知的状态中。
Chinese.verse 56:62: 你们确已知道初次的生长，你们怎不觉悟呢？
Chinese.verse 56:63: 你们告诉我吧！你们所耕种的庄稼，
Chinese.verse 56:64: 究竟是你们使它发荣呢？还是我使它发荣呢？
Chinese.verse 56:65: 假若我意欲，我必使它凋零，而你们变成诧异者，
Chinese.verse 56:66: 你们将说：我们是遭损失的。
Chinese.verse 56:68: 你们告诉吧！你们所饮的水，
Chinese.verse 56:69: 究竟是你们使它从云中降下的呢？还是我使它降下的呢？
Chinese.verse 56:70: 假若我意欲，我必使它变成苦的，你们怎么不感谢呢？
Chinese.verse 56:71: 你们告诉吧！你们所钻取的火；
Chinese.verse 56:72: 究竟是你们使燧木生长的呢？还是我使它生长的呢？
Chinese.verse 56:73: 我以它为教训，并且以它为荒野的居民的慰藉，
Chinese.verse 56:74: 故你们应当颂扬你的主的大名。
Chinese.verse 56:75: 我必以星宿的没落处盟誓，
Chinese.verse 56:76: 这确是一个重大的盟誓，假若你们知道。
Chinese.verse 56:79: 只有纯洁者才得抚摸那经本。
Chinese.verse 56:80: 《古兰经》是从全世界的主降示的。
Chinese.verse 56:83: （你们）怎么不在灵魂到将死者的咽喉的时候--
Chinese.verse 56:84: 那时候，你们大家看着他，
Chinese.verse 56:85: 我比你们更临近他，但你们不晓得，
Chinese.verse 56:86: 如果你们不是受报应的，--
Chinese.verse 56:87: 你们怎不使灵魂复返于本位呢？如果你们是说实话的。
Chinese.verse 56:89: 那末，他将享受舒适、给养与恩泽的乐园；
Chinese.verse 56:91: 那末，一般幸福的人将对他说：祝你平安！
Chinese.verse 56:92: 如果他是迷误的、否认复活者，
Chinese.verse 56:93: 那末，他将享受沸水的款待，
Chinese.verse 56:95: 这确是无可置疑的真理。
Chinese.verse 56:96: 故你应当颂扬你的主的大名。

Danish.verse 56:2: Zal er niets dit plaatsvinden kunnen tegenhouden
Danish.verse 56:3: Enigen zal het vernederen, anderen zal het verheffen
Danish.verse 56:4: Wanneer de aarde hevig zal worden geschokt
Danish.verse 56:6: Zullen deze als stof worden verstrooid
Danish.verse 56:7: En gij zult in drie soorten worden verdeeld
Danish.verse 56:8: De mensen aan de rechter kant - hoe (gelukkig zijn) de mensen aan de rechter kant
Danish.verse 56:9: En de mensen aan de linker kant - hoe (ongelukkig) zijn de mensen aan de linker kant
Danish.verse 56:10: De voorbijstrevenden (in het geloof) zullen de eersten zijn
Danish.verse 56:11: Dezen zijn de gunstelingen die God dicht zullen naderen
Danish.verse 56:13: Het zijn een groot aantal van de eersten
Danish.verse 56:15: Op sofa`s doorvlochten met goud en edelgesteenten
Danish.verse 56:17: Daar zullen jonge mannen onder hen rondgaan die niet zullen verouderen
Danish.verse 56:18: Met bekers, kannen en kopjes gevuld uit een zilveren bron
Danish.verse 56:19: Zij zullen daarvan geen hoofdpijn krijgen noch zullen zij dronken worden
Danish.verse 56:20: En met fruit dat zij het liefst hebben
Danish.verse 56:21: En met vlees van vogelen dat zij begeren
Danish.verse 56:22: En er zullen schonen zijn met grote, mooie ogen
Danish.verse 56:24: Als beloning voor hetgeen zij plachten te doen
Danish.verse 56:25: Zij zullen daar geen ijdele gesprekken of zondige taal horen
Danish.verse 56:27: En zij die rechts zullen staan - hoe (gelukkig) zijn deze die rechts staan
Danish.verse 56:28: Zij zullen zich bevinden tussen doornloze lotusbomen
Danish.verse 56:35: Voorwaar, Wij hebben dezen tot een wonderligke schepping gemaakt
Danish.verse 56:38: Tot degenen aan de rechter kant
Danish.verse 56:39: (Behoort) een groot aantal van de eersten (gelovigen)
Danish.verse 56:40: En een groot aantal uit latere tijden
Danish.verse 56:41: De mensen aan de linker kant - hoe (ongelukkig) zijn degenen die aan de linker kant staan
Danish.verse 56:42: Te midden van verschroeiende winden en kokend water
Danish.verse 56:43: En in de schaduw van zwarte rook
Danish.verse 56:45: Voordien waren zij inderdaad in weelde (op aarde)
Danish.verse 56:47: En zij plachten te zeggen: Als wij dood zijn en stof en beenderen zijn geworden, zullen wij inderdaad herrijzen
Danish.verse 56:49: Zeg: Ja, de vroegeren en de lateren
Danish.verse 56:50: Zullen tezamen worden verzameld op de vastgestelde tijd van een bepaalde Dag
Danish.verse 56:51: Dan, o gij, die waart verdwaald en hebt verloochend
Danish.verse 56:52: Gij zult. zeker van de boom van Zaqqoem eten
Danish.verse 56:53: En zult er uw buik mee vullen
Danish.verse 56:56: Dit zal hun onthaal zijn op de Dag des Gerichts
Danish.verse 56:57: Wij schiepen u, maar waarom wildet gij deWaarheid niet erkennen
Danish.verse 56:59: Schept gij het of zijn Wij de Schepper er van
Danish.verse 56:60: Wij hebben de dood onder u verordend en Wij kunnen niet worden tegengehouden
Danish.verse 56:61: Om anderen als gij in uw plaats te stellen en u in een toestand te brengen die gij niet kent
Danish.verse 56:62: En zeker kent gij de eerste schepping. Waarom trekt gij er dan geen lering uit
Danish.verse 56:63: Hebt gij gezien wat gij zaait
Danish.verse 56:64: Doen Wij het groeien of doet gij dat
Danish.verse 56:65: Als Wij het willen, kunnen Wij dat alles tot stof maken, dan blijft gij jammeren
Danish.verse 56:67: Meer nog, wij zijn van alles beroofd
Danish.verse 56:68: Ziet, het water dat gij drinkt
Danish.verse 56:69: Zijt gij het die het uit de wolken nederzendt, of zijn Wij de Zender
Danish.verse 56:70: Indien Wij het willen, kunnen Wij het bitter maken. Waarom zijt gij dan niet dankbaar
Danish.verse 56:71: En zeg mij; het vuur dat gij aansteekt
Danish.verse 56:72: Zijt gij het die de boom er voor doet groeien of zijn Wij het
Danish.verse 56:73: Wij hebben het tot een aanmaning en een weldaad gemaakt voor de reizigers in de wildernissen
Danish.verse 56:74: Daarom verheerlijk de naam van uw Heer, de Verhevene
Danish.verse 56:75: En Ik roep het verschieten der sterren tot getuige
Danish.verse 56:76: En inderdaad is dat een grote eed, indien gij het beseft
Danish.verse 56:79: Dat niemand zal aanraken behalve zij die zich louteren
Danish.verse 56:80: Een Openbaring van de Heer der Werelden
Danish.verse 56:82: En verzekert gij door de ontkenning ervan uw levensonderhoud
Danish.verse 56:83: Waarom dan, wanneer de ziel van (de stervende) zijn keel bereikt
Danish.verse 56:84: En gij ziet toe - op dat ogenblik
Danish.verse 56:85: Zijn Wij dichter bij hem dan gij, maar gij ziet dit niet
Danish.verse 56:86: Waarom dan, als gij niet onderdanig zijt
Danish.verse 56:87: Brengt gij haar niet terug indien gij waarachtig zijt
Danish.verse 56:88: Als hij nu behoort tot degenen, die dicht bij God zijn
Danish.verse 56:89: Dan is voor hem geluk en geur en een tuin van verrukking
Danish.verse 56:90: En indien hij behoort tot degenen aan de rechter kant
Danish.verse 56:91: Dan luidt het Vrede zij u van degenen aan de rechter kant
Danish.verse 56:92: Maar als hij behoort tot de dwalenden die (de Waarheid) hadden verloochend
Danish.verse 56:93: Dan is voor hem een onthaal op kokend water
Danish.verse 56:96: Verheerlijk daarom de naam van uw Heer, de Verhevene

Dutch.verse 56:1: Wanneer de Dag der Opstanding plaatsvindt.
Dutch.verse 56:2: (Dan) kent de gebeurtenis ervan geen loochening.
Dutch.verse 56:3: Verlagend (voor de één), verheffend (voor de ander).
Dutch.verse 56:4: Wanneer de aarde hevig geschud wordt.
Dutch.verse 56:5: En de bergen volledig vernietigd worden.
Dutch.verse 56:6: Zodat deze tot rondvliegend stof worden.
Dutch.verse 56:7: En jullie in drie groepen verdeeld zijn.
Dutch.verse 56:8: De mensen van de rechterzijde, (wat een voorspoed voor) de mensen van de rechterzijde!
Dutch.verse 56:9: En de mensen van de linkerzijde, (wat een tegenspoed voor) de mensen van de linkerzijde!
Dutch.verse 56:10: En de eersten (de derde groep) zijn de eersten.
Dutch.verse 56:11: Dat zijn degenen die nabij zijn gebracht.
Dutch.verse 56:12: In de Tuinen van gelukzaligheid (het Paradijs).
Dutch.verse 56:17: Onder hen gaan eeuwig jeugdigen rond.
Dutch.verse 56:18: Met bokalen en kannen en glazen, gevuld aan een stromende bron.
Dutch.verse 56:19: Waarvan zij geen hoofdpijn krijgen en niet dronken worden.
Dutch.verse 56:20: En vruchten waaruit zij kunnen kiezen.
Dutch.verse 56:21: En vlees van gevogelte, wat zij maar verlangen.
Dutch.verse 56:24: Als een beloning voor wat zij plachten te doen.
Dutch.verse 56:25: Zij horen daarin geen onzin en geen zondigheid.
Dutch.verse 56:27: En de mensen van de rechterzijde, (wat een voorspoed voor) de mensen van de rechterzijde!
Dutch.verse 56:35: Voorwaar, Wij hebben hen (de vrouwen in het Paradijs) opnieuw geschapen.
Dutch.verse 56:36: En Wij hebben hen maagdelijk gemaakt.
Dutch.verse 56:38: Voor de mensen aan de rechterzijde.
Dutch.verse 56:40: En een aantal van de lateren.
Dutch.verse 56:41: En de mensen van de linkerzijde, (wat een tegenspoed voor) de mensen aan de linkerzijde!
Dutch.verse 56:42: (Zij verkeren) in een verzengende wind en kokend water.
Dutch.verse 56:45: Voorwaar, zij plachten voorheen in weelde te leven.
Dutch.verse 56:46: En zij volhardden in geweldige zondigheid.
Dutch.verse 56:47: Zij plachten te zeggen: "Als wij gestorven zijn en tot stof en botten zijn geworden, zullen wij dan zeker opgewekt worden?
Dutch.verse 56:49: Zeg: "Voorwaar, de vroegeren en de lateren."
Dutch.verse 56:50: Zij zullen zeker bijeengebracht worden op het bepaalde tijdstip van een bekende Dag.
Dutch.verse 56:51: Daarna zullen jullie, O dwalende, loochenaars.
Dutch.verse 56:53: Dan zullen jullie daarmee de buiken vullen.
Dutch.verse 56:54: Daarna zullen jullie er (kokend water) van drinken.
Dutch.verse 56:55: Jullie zullen dan drinken als smachtende kamelen.
Dutch.verse 56:56: Dit is hun onthaal op de Dag des Oordeels.
Dutch.verse 56:57: Wij hebben jullie geschapen, waren jullie maar overtuigd geweest!
Dutch.verse 56:58: Hoe denken jullie dan over dat (zaad) wat jullie uitstorten?
Dutch.verse 56:59: Hebben jullie dat geschapen of zijn Wij de Scheppers?
Dutch.verse 56:60: Wij hebben de dood onder jullie bepaald, en Wij zijn niet zwak.
Dutch.verse 56:61: Om schepselen zoals jullie te scheppen en om jullie opnieuw tot leven te brengen in (een schepping) waarvan jullie niet weten.
Dutch.verse 56:62: En voorzeker, jullie hebben kennis over de eerste schepping, hadden jullie er maar lering uit getrokken!
Dutch.verse 56:63: Hoe denken jullie dan over wat jullie zaaien?
Dutch.verse 56:64: Zijn jullie het die het doen groeien of zijn Wij het Die doen groeien?
Dutch.verse 56:65: Als Wij zouden willen, dan zouden Wij het laten verdorren, zodat jullie het zouden blijven betreuren.
Dutch.verse 56:66: (En zeiden:) "Voorwaar, wij zijn zeker met schuld beladen.
Dutch.verse 56:68: Hoe denken jullie dan over het water dat jullie drinken?
Dutch.verse 56:69: Zijn jullie het die het uit de wolken doen neerkomen of zijn Wij de neerzenders?
Dutch.verse 56:70: Als Wij zouden willen, dan zouden Wij het tot zout water maken. Waren jullie maar dankbaar!
Dutch.verse 56:71: Hoe denken jullie dan over het vuur dat jullie ontsteken?
Dutch.verse 56:72: Hebben jullie de boom daarvoor voortgebracht, of zijn Wij de voortbrengers?
Dutch.verse 56:73: Wij hebben het (vuur) gemaakt ter herinnering en tot nut voor de reizigers.
Dutch.verse 56:74: Prijst daarom de Naam van jouw Heer, de Geweldige.
Dutch.verse 56:75: Ik zweer bij het vallen van de sterren.
Dutch.verse 56:76: En voorwaar, dat is zeker een geweldige eed, als jullie dat begrepen!
Dutch.verse 56:77: En voorwaar, dit is zeker de nobele Koran.
Dutch.verse 56:79: Dat niemand aanraakt dan de gereinigden.
Dutch.verse 56:80: Een neerzending van de Heer der Werelden.
Dutch.verse 56:82: En nemen jullie het loochenen (als dankbetuiging voor) jullie levensvoorziening?
Dutch.verse 56:83: Waren jullie maar, toen (de ziel) de keel bereikte.
Dutch.verse 56:84: En jullie op dat moment toezagen.
Dutch.verse 56:85: En Wij dichter bij hem waren dan jullie - maar jullie zagen het niet.
Dutch.verse 56:86: Waren jullie toen maar niet verantwoordelijk geweest.
Dutch.verse 56:87: Dan zouden jullie haar (de ziel) terugbrengen, als jullie waarachtig geweest waren.
Dutch.verse 56:88: Als hij (de ziel) tot de nabijgebrachten behoort.
Dutch.verse 56:89: (Dan zijn er voor de ziel) rust en voorzieningen en de Tuinen van gelukzaligheid (het Paradijs).
Dutch.verse 56:90: Als hij tot de mensen aan de rechterzijde behoort.
Dutch.verse 56:91: (Luidt de begroeting.) "Vrede zij met jou," van de mensen van de rechterzijde.
Dutch.verse 56:92: En als hij tot de dwalende loochenaars behoort.
Dutch.verse 56:93: Dan is er een onthaal van kokend water.
Dutch.verse 56:95: Voorwaar, dit is zeker de stellige Waarheid.
Dutch.verse 56:96: Prijst daarom de Naam van jouw Heer, de Geweldige.

English.verse 56:2: There is, at its occurrence, no denial.
English.verse 56:3: It will bring down [some] and raise up [others].
English.verse 56:4: When the earth is shaken with convulsion
English.verse 56:5: And the mountains are broken down, crumbling
English.verse 56:8: Then the companions of the right - what are the companions of the right?
English.verse 56:9: And the companions of the left - what are the companions of the left?
English.verse 56:11: Those are the ones brought near [to Allah]
English.verse 56:13: A [large] company of the former peoples
English.verse 56:14: And a few of the later peoples,
English.verse 56:16: Reclining on them, facing each other.
English.verse 56:17: There will circulate among them young boys made eternal
English.verse 56:18: With vessels, pitchers and a cup [of wine] from a flowing spring -
English.verse 56:19: No headache will they have therefrom, nor will they be intoxicated -
English.verse 56:20: And fruit of what they select
English.verse 56:21: And the meat of fowl, from whatever they desire.
English.verse 56:22: And [for them are] fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes,
English.verse 56:24: As reward for what they used to do.
English.verse 56:25: They will not hear therein ill speech or commission of sin -
English.verse 56:27: The companions of the right - what are the companions of the right?
English.verse 56:28: [They will be] among lote trees with thorns removed
English.verse 56:35: Indeed, We have produced the women of Paradise in a [new] creation
English.verse 56:37: Devoted [to their husbands] and of equal age,
English.verse 56:38: For the companions of the right [who are]
English.verse 56:39: A company of the former peoples
English.verse 56:40: And a company of the later peoples.
English.verse 56:41: And the companions of the left - what are the companions of the left?
English.verse 56:42: [They will be] in scorching fire and scalding water
English.verse 56:43: And a shade of black smoke,
English.verse 56:45: Indeed they were, before that, indulging in affluence,
English.verse 56:46: And they used to persist in the great violation,
English.verse 56:47: And they used to say, "When we die and become dust and bones, are we indeed to be resurrected?
English.verse 56:49: Say, [O Muhammad], "Indeed, the former and the later peoples
English.verse 56:50: Are to be gathered together for the appointment of a known Day."
English.verse 56:51: Then indeed you, O those astray [who are] deniers,
English.verse 56:52: Will be eating from trees of zaqqum
English.verse 56:53: And filling with it your bellies
English.verse 56:54: And drinking on top of it from scalding water
English.verse 56:55: And will drink as the drinking of thirsty camels.
English.verse 56:56: That is their accommodation on the Day of Recompense.
English.verse 56:57: We have created you, so why do you not believe?
English.verse 56:58: Have you seen that which you emit?
English.verse 56:59: Is it you who creates it, or are We the Creator?
English.verse 56:60: We have decreed death among you, and We are not to be outdone
English.verse 56:61: In that We will change your likenesses and produce you in that [form] which you do not know.
English.verse 56:62: And you have already known the first creation, so will you not remember?
English.verse 56:63: And have you seen that [seed] which you sow?
English.verse 56:64: Is it you who makes it grow, or are We the grower?
English.verse 56:65: If We willed, We could make it [dry] debris, and you would remain in wonder,
English.verse 56:68: And have you seen the water that you drink?
English.verse 56:69: Is it you who brought it down from the clouds, or is it We who bring it down?
English.verse 56:70: If We willed, We could make it bitter, so why are you not grateful?
English.verse 56:71: And have you seen the fire that you ignite?
English.verse 56:72: Is it you who produced its tree, or are We the producer?
English.verse 56:73: We have made it a reminder and provision for the travelers,
English.verse 56:74: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great.
English.verse 56:75: Then I swear by the setting of the stars,
English.verse 56:76: And indeed, it is an oath - if you could know - [most] great.
English.verse 56:77: Indeed, it is a noble Qur'an
English.verse 56:79: None touch it except the purified.
English.verse 56:80: [It is] a revelation from the Lord of the worlds.
English.verse 56:81: Then is it to this statement that you are indifferent
English.verse 56:82: And make [the thanks for] your provision that you deny [the Provider]?
English.verse 56:83: Then why, when the soul at death reaches the throat
English.verse 56:84: And you are at that time looking on -
English.verse 56:85: And Our angels are nearer to him than you, but you do not see -
English.verse 56:86: Then why do you not, if you are not to be recompensed,
English.verse 56:87: Bring it back, if you should be truthful?
English.verse 56:88: And if the deceased was of those brought near to Allah,
English.verse 56:89: Then [for him is] rest and bounty and a garden of pleasure.
English.verse 56:90: And if he was of the companions of the right,
English.verse 56:91: Then [the angels will say], "Peace for you; [you are] from the companions of the right."
English.verse 56:92: But if he was of the deniers [who were] astray,
English.verse 56:93: Then [for him is] accommodation of scalding water
English.verse 56:95: Indeed, this is the true certainty,
English.verse 56:96: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great.

Filipino.verse 56:1: Kung ang Pangyayari na hindi maiiwasan (alalaong baga, ang Araw ng Muling Pagkabuhay) ay dumatal na
Filipino.verse 56:2: Na walang (kaluluwa) ang makapagtatatwa tungkol sa pagdatal nito
Filipino.verse 56:3: Na ito ay magpapababa (sa ilan) at magtataas naman (sa iba)
Filipino.verse 56:4: Kung ang kalupaan ay makalog sa kanyang kailaliman
Filipino.verse 56:5: Kung ang kabundukan ay gumulong at madurog
Filipino.verse 56:6: At ito ay maging alabok na nagsisipangalat
Filipino.verse 56:7: At kayong (lahat) ay pagbubukod-bukurin sa tatlong uri (alalaong baga, sa tatlong pangkat)
Filipino.verse 56:8: (Ang una), ay mga kasamahan ng Kanang Kamay (alalaong baga, sila na bibigyan ng kanilang Talaan sa kanilang kanang kamay), - Sino baga sila na nasa Kanang Kamay (bilang paggalang sa kanila sapagkat sila ay papasok sa Paraiso)
Filipino.verse 56:9: (At ang sumunod ) ay mga Kasamahan ng Kaliwang Kamay (alalaong baga, sila na bibigyan ng kanilang Talaan sa kanilang kaliwang kamay), - Sino baga sila na nasa Kaliwang Kamay (bilang kahihiyan sa kanila sapagkat sila ay papasok sa Impiyerno)
Filipino.verse 56:10: (At pangatlo) ang Pinakapangunahin (sa pagiging matimtiman sa Pananalig sa Islam at paniniwala sa Kaisahan ni Allah at gumagawa ng lahat ng mga pagsunod kay Allah at sa Kanyang Tagapagbalita), ay magiging tampok (sa Paraiso)
Filipino.verse 56:11: Sila ang magiging pinakamalapit kay Allah
Filipino.verse 56:13: Ang karamihan ng mga tao (sa Pinakapangunahin) ay magmumula sa mga sinaunang henerasyon (na yumakap sa Islam)
Filipino.verse 56:14: At ang iba pang karamihan (sa Pinakapangunahin), ay sila na galing sa mga huling panahon (ng henerasyon)
Filipino.verse 56:15: (Sila ay malalagay) sa mga luklukan na nagagayakan ng ginto at mamahaling bato
Filipino.verse 56:17: Atsakanilaaynakapaligidang(mganagsisilbing) kabataan na nananatiling (sariwa) sa habang panahon
Filipino.verse 56:18: Na may mga tangang kopita at (nangingislap) na bangang sisidlan at mga baso na puno ng dalisay na alak (mula sa batis)
Filipino.verse 56:19: (Na sa pag-inom nito), sila ay hindi makakaramdam ng pananakit ng ulo at gayundin ng pagkalasing
Filipino.verse 56:20: At mga bungangkahoy, anuman ang kanilang piliin
Filipino.verse 56:21: At anumang karne ng mga pabo (at kauri nito) na kanilang maibigan
Filipino.verse 56:22: At sila ay (magkakaroon) ng mga Houris (kasamahang babae na may magaganda, mapuputi at may maniningning na mga mata [bilang asawa ng mga matimtiman)
Filipino.verse 56:23: Na tulad ng mga natatagong Perlas
Filipino.verse 56:24: Bilang gantimpala sa kanilang ginawa ng nakalipas (na buhay)
Filipino.verse 56:25: At doon ay wala silang maririnig na malalaswang salita o anumang salita ng kapintasan o kasalanan (tulad ng paninirang puri, atbp)
Filipino.verse 56:26: Maliban lamang sa pagsasabi ng : Kapayapaan! (at muli ay) Kapayapaan
Filipino.verse 56:27: At sila na kasamahan ng Kanang Kamay, - Sino baga sila na magiging kasamahan ng Kanang Kamay
Filipino.verse 56:28: (Sila) ay mananahan sa gitna ng mga punong lote na walang tinik
Filipino.verse 56:29: Sa gitna ng punong Talh (punong saging), na may mga bulaklak (at bunga) na kumpol-kumpol
Filipino.verse 56:31: Sa tabi ng tubig na patuloy na dumadaloy
Filipino.verse 56:33: Na hindi nagmamaliw ang bunga (kahit wala sa panahon) at hindi nauubusan ng ani
Filipino.verse 56:34: At sa mga luklukan (ng karangalan) na nakataas
Filipino.verse 56:35: Pagmasdan! Katotohanang nilikha Namin ang kanilang Kasamahan (mga Dalaga), sa natatanging paglikha
Filipino.verse 56:36: At (Aming) ginawaran sila ng pagiging birhen
Filipino.verse 56:37: Na inaalagaan (ng kalikasan) ng pantay-pantay sa gulang
Filipino.verse 56:38: Na nalalaan sa mga kasamahan ng Kanang Kamay
Filipino.verse 56:39: Ang karamihan sa mga tao (ng Kanang Kamay) ay magmumula sa sinaunang henerasyon (ng mga yumakap sa Islam)
Filipino.verse 56:40: At ang iba pang karamihan ng mga tao (ng Kanang Kamay) ay sila na galing sa (henerasyon) ng huling panahon
Filipino.verse 56:41: At sila na kasamahan ng Kaliwang Kamay, - Sino nga ba sila na magiging kasamahan ng Kaliwang Kamay
Filipino.verse 56:42: (Sila ay magigitna) sa nakakapasong Lagablab ng Apoy at kumukulong tubig
Filipino.verse 56:43: At sa Anino (Lilim) ng Maitim na Usok
Filipino.verse 56:44: (Ang Lilim) na ito ay walang anumang lamig o kaginhawahan
Filipino.verse 56:45: Katotohanang bago pa ito (ang Kaparusahan), sila ay nalulong sa karangyaan (at luho sa kayamanan)
Filipino.verse 56:46: At nagpatuloy sa pamimihasa sa kahiya- hiyang kabuktutan (tulad ng pagsasama ng katambal sa pagsamba kay Allah, pagpatay, paggawa ng mga krimen, atbp)
Filipino.verse 56:47: At lagi nilang ipinagbabadya: “Ano? Kung kami ba ay mamatay at maging alabok at kalansay, kami ba ay tunay na ibabangong muli sa pagkabuhay?”
Filipino.verse 56:48: (Kami) at ang aming mga ninuno (noong pang panahong sinauna)
Filipino.verse 56:49: Ipagbadya (o Muhammad): “Tunay nga! Silang (mga tao) ng panahong sinauna at silang (mga tao) ng huling panahon.”
Filipino.verse 56:50: walang pagsala na titipunin ang lahat ng sama-sama sa natataningang pakikipagtipan sa Bantog na Araw
Filipino.verse 56:51: Katotohanang kayo na mapaggawa ng kamalian, kayo na humahalakhak (sa katotohanan) at nagtatatwa (sa Muling Pagkabuhay)
Filipino.verse 56:52: Katotohanang inyong matitikman ang puno ng Zaqqum
Filipino.verse 56:53: At inyong pupunuin ang inyong sikmura ng mga ito
Filipino.verse 56:54: Tangi pa rito, kayo ay iinom ng kumukulong tubig
Filipino.verse 56:55: Katotohanang kayo ay magsisiinom (nito) na katulad ng kamelyong may sakit na sumisingasing sa pagkauhaw
Filipino.verse 56:56: Ito ang kanilang magiging pasalubong sa Araw ng Kabayaran
Filipino.verse 56:57: Kami (Allah) ang lumikha sa inyo; bakit hindi ninyo saksihan ang Katotohanan
Filipino.verse 56:58: Nakikita ba ninyo ang binhi ng tao (semilya) na inyong inilalabas
Filipino.verse 56:59: Kayo ba ang lumikha sa mga ito (semilya, na nagiging isang ganap na tao), o Kami ba ang Manlilikha
Filipino.verse 56:60: Itinakda Namin ang kamatayan sa inyong lahat na inyong maranasan at Kami ay hindi manlulupaypay
Filipino.verse 56:61: Na baguhin ang inyong anyo at muli kayong likhain sa (bagong) anyo na hindi ninyo nababatid
Filipino.verse 56:62: At katotohanang batid ninyo ang unang anyo ng paglikha (alalaong baga, ang paglikha kay Adan). Bakit nga ba hindi ninyo ipinagbubunyi ang pagpupuri sa Kanya o (kayo ay) tumatalima
Filipino.verse 56:63: Sabihin ninyo sa Akin! Nakikita ba ninyo ang butong (binhi) na inyong itinatanim sa lupa
Filipino.verse 56:64: Kayo ba ang nagpatubo sa mga ito o Kami ba na Manlilikha ang nagpatubo
Filipino.verse 56:65: Kung Aming nanaisin ay magagawa Namin na maging tulyapis ito at kayo ay magsisisi (o maiiwan sa pagkamangha)
Filipino.verse 56:66: Na magsasabi: “Katotohanang kami ay Maghramun (mga nabibigatan sa pagkakautang o nalugi at naparusahan sa kawalan ng pakinabang)
Filipino.verse 56:67: Katotohanang kami ay hindi nakinabang (sa bunga ng aming paghihirap)
Filipino.verse 56:68: Sabihin ninyo sa Akin! Nakikita ba ninyo ang tubig na inyong iniinom
Filipino.verse 56:69: Kayo ba ang nagpamalisbis nito mula sa mga ulap o Kami ba na Nagpapahintulot ang nagpamalisbis nito
Filipino.verse 56:70: Kung Aming ninais ay magagawa Namin ito na maging mapait (at maalat na hindi maiinom). Bakit nga ba kayo ay hindi nagbibigay pasalamat (kay Allah)
Filipino.verse 56:71: Sabihin ninyo sa Akin! Nakikita ba ninyo ang apoy na inyong pinagdiringas
Filipino.verse 56:72: Kayo ba ang nagpatubo sa mga punongkahoy na pinagkukunan ng apoy (at panggatong) o Kami ang nagpatubo nito
Filipino.verse 56:73: Ginawa Namin ito bilang Paala-ala (saApoy ng Impiyerno sa Kabilang Buhay); at isang bagay ng kaginhawahan sa mga naninirahan sa ilang (at sa lahat ng iba pa rito sa mundo)
Filipino.verse 56:74: Kaya’t ipagdiwang ng may pagpupuri ang Pangalan ng iyong Panginoon, ang Kataas-taasan
Filipino.verse 56:75: Tunay nga! Aming tinawag upang magpatotoo ang Mawaqi (ang paglubog o malalaking palasyo ng mga bituin)
Filipino.verse 56:76: At katotohanang ito ay dakilang pagsumpa, kung inyo lamang nalalaman
Filipino.verse 56:77: At katotohanang (ito) ang pinakamarangal (at banal) na pagdalit (ang Qur’an)
Filipino.verse 56:78: Sa isang Aklat na ganap na napapangalagaan (na kay Allah sa Kalangitan, alalaong baga ang Al Lauh Al Mahfuz)
Filipino.verse 56:79: Na walang sinuman ang makakahipo niyaon (Aklat ni Allah) maliban sa (kanila) na dalisay at malilinis sa kasalanan (alalaong baga, ang mga anghel)
Filipino.verse 56:80: Isang Kapahayagan (ang Qur’an) mula sa Panginoon ng lahat ng mga nilalang
Filipino.verse 56:81: Ang Pahayag bang ito (ang Qur’an) ay hindi ninyo (mga hindi sumasampalataya) gaanong pinapahalagahan
Filipino.verse 56:82: At sa halip (na inyong pasalamatan si Allah) sa mga biyaya na inyong ikinabubuhay mula sa Kanya, sa kabalintunaan ay inyong itinatwa Siya (sa kawalan ng pananalig)
Filipino.verse 56:83: Nguni’t bakit hindi ninyo (pinangahasan) nang ang ( kaluluwa ng isang mamamatay na tao) ay umabot na sa kanyang lalamunan
Filipino.verse 56:84: At kayo ay pansamantalang (nakaupo) at nakatingin lamang
Filipino.verse 56:85: Datapuwa’t Kami (alalaong baga, ang Aming mga anghel na kumukuha ng kaluluwa) ay higit na malapit sa kanya kaysa sa inyo, subalit (sila) ay hindi ninyo nakikita
Filipino.verse 56:86: Kaya’t bakit hindi ninyo ginawa, - kung kayo nga ay hindi sakop ng (darating) na pagsusulit at kabayaran (kaparusahan, atbp)
Filipino.verse 56:87: Inyong ibalik (muli ang kanyang) kaluluwa sa kanyang katawan, kung kayo ay nagsasabi ng katotohanan
Filipino.verse 56:88: At kung siya (na mamamatay na) ay isa sa Muqaribun (siya na ang magiging kasama ay mga malalapit kay Allah)
Filipino.verse 56:89: (Sasakanya) ang kapahingahan at kasiyahan sa Hardin ng Kaligayahan (Paraiso)
Filipino.verse 56:90: At kung siya (na mamatay na) ay kasamahan ng Kanang Kamay
Filipino.verse 56:91: (Ay sasakanya ang pagbati): Sumainyo ang kapayapaan at kapanatagan mula sa mga kasamahan ng Kanang Kamay
Filipino.verse 56:92: Datapuwa’t kung siya (na mamamatay) ay kasama roon sa mga nagtuturing na huwad (sa katotohanan ang Muling Pagkabuhay), at tumahak sa kamalian
Filipino.verse 56:93: Sa kanya ay isasalubong ang kumukulong tubig
Filipino.verse 56:94: At pagkasunog sa Apoy ng Impiyerno
Filipino.verse 56:95: Tunay ngang ito ang Lubos na Katotohanan, ang Katiyakan
Filipino.verse 56:96: Kaya’t ipagbunyi nang may pagpupuri ang Pangalan ng iyong Panginoon, ang Kataas-taasan

French.verse 56:2: nul ne traitera sa venue de mensonge.
French.verse 56:3: Il abaissera (les uns), il élèvera (les autres).
French.verse 56:4: Quand la terre sera secouée violemment,
French.verse 56:5: et les montagnes seront réduites en miettes,
French.verse 56:8: les gens de la droite - que sont les gens de la droite?
French.verse 56:9: Et les gens de la gauche - que sont les gens de la gauche?
French.verse 56:10: Les premiers (à suivre les ordres d'Allah sur la terre) ce sont eux qui seront les premiers (dans l'au-delà)
French.verse 56:11: Ce sont ceux-là les plus rapprochés d'Allah
French.verse 56:13: une multitude d'élus parmi les premières [générations],
French.verse 56:14: et un petit nombre parmi les dernières [générations],
French.verse 56:15: sur des lits ornés [d'or et de pierreries],
French.verse 56:16: s'y accoudant et se faisant face.
French.verse 56:17: Parmi eux circuleront des garçons éternellement jeunes,
French.verse 56:18: avec des coupes, des aiguières et un verre [rempli] d'une liqueur de source
French.verse 56:19: qui ne leur provoquera ni maux de tête ni étourdissement;
French.verse 56:20: et des fruits de leur choix,
French.verse 56:21: et toute chair d'oiseau qu'ils désireront.
French.verse 56:22: Et ils auront des houris aux yeux, grands et beaux,
French.verse 56:23: pareilles à des perles en coquille
French.verse 56:24: en récompense pour ce qu'ils faisaient.
French.verse 56:25: Ils n'y entendront ni futilité ni blasphème;
French.verse 56:26: mais seulement les propos: «Salâm! Salâm!»... [Paix! Paix!]
French.verse 56:27: Et les gens de la droite; que sont les gens de la droite?
French.verse 56:28: [Ils seront parmi] des jujubiers sans épines,
French.verse 56:29: et parmi des bananiers aux régimes bien fournis,
French.verse 56:35: C'est Nous qui les avons créées à la perfection,
French.verse 56:36: et Nous les avons faites vierges,
French.verse 56:38: pour les gens de la droite,
French.verse 56:39: une multitude d'élus parmi les premières [générations],
French.verse 56:40: et une multitude d'élus parmi les dernières [générations].
French.verse 56:41: Et les gens de la gauche; que sont les gens de la gauche?
French.verse 56:42: ils seront au milieu d'un souffle brûlant et d'une eau bouillante,
French.verse 56:45: Ils vivaient auparavant dans le luxe.
French.verse 56:46: Ils persistaient dans le grand péché [le polythéisme]
French.verse 56:47: et disaient: «Quand nous mourrons et serons poussière et ossements, serons-nous ressuscités?
French.verse 56:49: Dis: «En vérité les premiers et les derniers
French.verse 56:50: seront réunis pour le rendez-vous d'un jour connu».
French.verse 56:51: Et puis, vous, les égarés, qui traitiez (la Résurrection) de mensonge,
French.verse 56:52: vous mangerez certainement d'un arbre de Zaqqûm.
French.verse 56:53: vous vous en remplirez le ventre,
French.verse 56:54: puis vous boirez par-dessus cela de l'eau bouillante,
French.verse 56:55: vous en boirez comme boivent les chameaux assoiffés.
French.verse 56:56: Voilà le repas d'accueil qui leur sera servi, au jour de la Rétribution.
French.verse 56:57: C'est Nous qui vous avons créés. Pourquoi ne croiriez-vous donc pas [à la résurrection]?
French.verse 56:58: Voyez-vous donc ce que vous éjaculez:
French.verse 56:59: est-ce vous qui le créez ou [en] sommes Nous le Créateur?
French.verse 56:60: Nous avons prédéterminé la mort parmi vous. Nous ne serons point empêchés
French.verse 56:61: de vous remplacer par vos semblables, et vous faire renaître dans [un état] que vous ne savez pas.
French.verse 56:62: Vous avez connu la première création. Ne vous rappelez-vous donc pas?
French.verse 56:63: Voyez-vous donc ce que vous labourez?
French.verse 56:64: Est-ce vous qui le cultivez? ou [en] sommes Nous le cultivateur?
French.verse 56:65: Si Nous voulions, Nous le réduirions en débris. Et vous ne cesseriez pas de vous étonner et [de crier]:
French.verse 56:68: Voyez-vous donc l'eau que vous buvez?
French.verse 56:69: Est-ce vous qui l'avez fait descendre du nuage? ou [en] sommes Nous le descendeur?
French.verse 56:70: Si Nous voulions, Nous la rendrions salée. Pourquoi n'êtes-vous donc pas reconnaissants?
French.verse 56:71: Voyez-vous donc le feu que vous obtenez par frottement?
French.verse 56:72: Est-ce vous qui avez créé son arbre ou [en] sommes Nous le Créateur?
French.verse 56:73: Nous en avons fait un rappel (de l'Enfer), et un élément utile pour ceux qui en ont besoin.
French.verse 56:74: Glorifie donc le nom de ton Seigneur, le Très Grand!
French.verse 56:75: Non!.. Je jure par les positions des étoiles (dans le firmament).
French.verse 56:76: Et c'est vraiment un serment solennel, si vous saviez.
French.verse 56:77: Et c'est certainement un Coran noble,
French.verse 56:80: C'est une révélation de la part du Seigneur de l'Univers.
French.verse 56:81: Est-ce ce discours-là que vous traitez de mensonge?
French.verse 56:82: Et est-ce pour vous [une façon d'être reconnaissant] à votre subsistance que de traiter (le Coran) de mensonge?
French.verse 56:83: Lorsque le souffle de la vie remonte à la gorge (d'un moribond),
French.verse 56:84: et qu'à ce moment là vous regardez,
French.verse 56:85: et que Nous sommes plus proche de lui que vous [qui l'entourez] mais vous ne [le] voyez point.
French.verse 56:86: Pourquoi donc, si vous croyez que vous n'avez pas de compte à rendre,
French.verse 56:87: ne la faites-vous pas revenir [cette âme], si vous êtes véridiques?
French.verse 56:88: Si celui-ci est du nombre des rapprochés (d'Allah),
French.verse 56:89: alors (il aura) du repos, de la grâce et un Jardin de délices.
French.verse 56:90: Et s'il est du nombre des gens de la droite,
French.verse 56:91: il sera [accueilli par ces mots]: «Paix à toi» de la part des gens de la droite.
French.verse 56:92: Et s'il est de ceux qui avaient traité de mensonge (la résurrection) et s'étaient égarés,
French.verse 56:93: alors, il sera installé dans une eau bouillante,
French.verse 56:94: et il brûlera dans la Fournaise.
French.verse 56:96: Glorifie donc le nom de ton Seigneur, le Très Grand!

Fulah.verse 56:8: Ko wontirooɓe ñaamo ɓen - iskin ɓen yimɓe ñaamo
Fulah.verse 56:9: e wontirooɓe nano ɓen, bis e ɓen yimɓe nano
Fulah.verse 56:10: Ko adondiraynooɓe ɓen (e moƴƴere ka aduna), adoytee (naadeede Aljanna)
Fulah.verse 56:14: e seeɗaaɓe jeyaaɓe e [mofte] sakkitiiɓe ɓen
Fulah.verse 56:16: hara hiɓe soɓɓindii e majje, fewtondirɓe
Fulah.verse 56:17: Sukaaɓe duuminaaɓe hino wanngoo hakkunde maɓɓe
Fulah.verse 56:18: wonndude e ñedduɗe, e cataloy, e koroy e [hebbiniraakoy] beere ilaynde
Fulah.verse 56:19: ɓe muusetaake ko*e nder ton, ɓe siwritaa
Fulah.verse 56:21: e teewu colli ngu ɓe tuuyatee
Fulah.verse 56:25: Ɓe nanataa nder ton haala meere, wanaa ko bakkondiŋta
Fulah.verse 56:26: si wanaa wi`aneede : "Salaaman! Salaaman!" [Saɗi mon! saɗi mon]
Fulah.verse 56:27: E wontirooɓe ñaamo ɓen, ko woni ɓen yimɓe ñaamo
Fulah.verse 56:40: e seeɗaaɓe jeyaaɓe e [mofte] sakkitiiɓe ɓen
Fulah.verse 56:41: E wontirooɓe nano ɓen. Ko homɓe woni ɓen yimɓe nano
Fulah.verse 56:45: Ado ɗum, hari ko ɓe neeminaaɓe
Fulah.verse 56:46: ɓe laatino hiɓe deppitoo e bakkaat mawɗi ɗin
Fulah.verse 56:47: hiɓe wi`aynoo: "Enee, si men maayii, men wontii mbullaari e ƴi’e, hara ko men immintinoyteeɓe
Fulah.verse 56:50: ko mooɓoyteeɓe e ñalaande anndaande waqutu mun
Fulah.verse 56:51: refti pellet, onon ɓee majjuɓe fennuɓe [ummital]
Fulah.verse 56:52: ko on nyaamoyayɓe e leggal "Zaqquumi" ngal
Fulah.verse 56:56: Ko ɗum woni ko ɓe kottiigu !u! en ñalnde njoɓdi diina
Fulah.verse 56:57: Ko Menen woni ko tagi on. Haɗi goonginon [Men immintinay on]
Fulah.verse 56:58: On yi`ii on maniiyu mo rufoton
Fulah.verse 56:59: Ko onon tagata mo? Kaa ko Menen woni tagooɓe [ɗum]
Fulah.verse 56:60: Ko Menen hoddiri maayde nden hakkunde mon. Men wonaali adateeɓe
Fulah.verse 56:61: e wattitugol yeruuɓe mon, Men fuɗɗira on e ko on anndah
Fulah.verse 56:62: Gomɗii hiɗon anndi tageede aranun ɗum. Ko haɗi waajitoɗon
Fulah.verse 56:64: Ko onon fuɗinta ɗum? Kaa ko Menen woni fuɗinooɓe ɓen
Fulah.verse 56:65: Si Men haajuno, pellet, Men waɗayno ndu foron. Wattinon hiɗon haawoo [wi`a]
Fulah.verse 56:66: Menen ko men lepteteeɓe perte ko min nafqi ko
Fulah.verse 56:68: On yi`ii ndiyam ɗam yaroton ɗam
Fulah.verse 56:69: E ko onon jippiniri ɗam ka duule? Kaa ko Menen jippini [ɗam]
Fulah.verse 56:70: Si Men haajuno, Men waɗayno ɗam kaaɗɗam. Ko haɗi yetton [Allah]
Fulah.verse 56:71: On yi`ii yiite nge huɓɓoton ngen
Fulah.verse 56:72: E ko onon woodini waɗi leɗɗe mum? Kaa ko Menen woodini [ɗe]
Fulah.verse 56:73: Men waɗir ngen [yiite] waaju, e nafitor nge setotooɓe
Fulah.verse 56:74: Subbunhinor innde Joomi maa, Mawɗo On
Fulah.verse 56:76: Pellet, ɗum ko woondoore mawnde, si hiɗon anndunoo
Fulah.verse 56:77: Pellet ndee ko Alqur`aanaare konde teddunde
Fulah.verse 56:79: meemataa nden si wanaa laɓɓinaaɓe ɓen
Fulah.verse 56:80: ko jippiniraande ka Jeyɗo Winndere nden
Fulah.verse 56:81: E ko ndee yewtere wonki ko pennoton onon
Fulah.verse 56:82: Hiɗon waɗa arsike mon (toɓo ngon) ko on fennooɓe [arsikuɗo On]
Fulah.verse 56:83: Ko haɗata nde wonkii yottii ka lookoƴere
Fulah.verse 56:85: hara non ko Menen ɓuri on ɓadaade mo, kono on yi`ataa
Fulah.verse 56:86: Ko haɗata on, si tawiino hara on warjetaake
Fulah.verse 56:87: rutton kin [wonkii], si tawii ko on goonguɓe
Fulah.verse 56:88: Si tawii on ko jeyaaɗo e ɓattinaaɓe ɓen
Fulah.verse 56:89: haray ko fowtere, e moƴƴere, e Aljannaaji neema (woodani mo)
Fulah.verse 56:90: Si tawii kadi ko jeyaaɗo e yimɓe ñaamo ɓen
Fulah.verse 56:91: haray [o jaɓɓoroyte] : "Kisal maa" e ɓaŋge yimɓe ñaamo ɓen
Fulah.verse 56:92: Si tawii non ko jeyanooɗo e fennuɓe majjuɓe ɓen
Fulah.verse 56:93: haray hoɗtorde makko on ko fatayɗam
Fulah.verse 56:95: Pellet, ko ɗum woni goonga yananaaɗo on
Fulah.verse 56:96: Subbunhinor innde Joomi maa, Mawɗo On

German.verse 56:1: Wenn die (Stunde) eintrifft, die eintreffen wird,
German.verse 56:2: gibt es niemanden, der ihr Eintreffen leugnen wird.
German.verse 56:3: Sie wird (manches) niedrig machen und (manches) erhöhen.
German.verse 56:4: Wenn die Erde heftig hin und her geschüttelt wird
German.verse 56:5: und die Berge völlig zermalmt werden
German.verse 56:6: und dann zu verstreutem Staub werden
German.verse 56:8: Die Gefährten von der rechten Seite - was sind die Gefährten von der rechten Seite?
German.verse 56:9: Und die Gefährten von der unheilvollen Seite - was sind die Gefährten von der unheilvollen Seite?
German.verse 56:10: Und die Vorausgeeilten, ja die Vorausgeeilten,
German.verse 56:11: das sind diejenigen, die (Allah) nahegestellt sein werden,
German.verse 56:16: lehnen sie sich darauf einander gegenüber.
German.verse 56:17: Unter ihnen gehen ewig junge Knaben umher
German.verse 56:18: mit Trinkschalen und Krügen und einem Becher aus einem Quell -,
German.verse 56:19: von ihm bekommen sie weder Kopfschmerzen noch werden sie dadurch benommen,
German.verse 56:20: und (mit) Früchten von dem, was sie sich auswählen,
German.verse 56:21: und Fleisch von Geflügel von dem, was sie begehren.
German.verse 56:22: Und (darin sind) Huris mit schönen, großen Augen,
German.verse 56:24: (Dies) als Lohn für das, was sie zu tun pflegten.
German.verse 56:25: Weder hören sie darin unbedachte Rede noch Anklage der Sünde,
German.verse 56:27: Und die Gefährten der rechten Seite - was sind die Gefährten von der rechten Seite?
German.verse 56:33: die weder unterbrochen noch verwehrt sind,
German.verse 56:35: Wir haben sie derart entstehen lassen
German.verse 56:38: für die Gefährten der rechten Seite.
German.verse 56:40: und eine Menge von den Späteren.
German.verse 56:41: Und die Gefährten der linken Seite - was sind die Gefährten der linken Seite?
German.verse 56:42: (Sie sind) in Glutwind und heißem Wasser
German.verse 56:46: und verharrten in dem gewaltigen Unglauben
German.verse 56:47: und pflegten zu sagen: "Wenn wir gestorben und zu Erde und Knochen geworden sind, sollen wir denn dann wirklich auferweckt werden?
German.verse 56:49: Sag: Die Früheren und die Späteren
German.verse 56:50: werden wahrlich versammelt werden zur festgesetzten Zeit eines (wohl)bekannten Tages.
German.verse 56:51: Hierauf werdet ihr ja, ihr irregehenden Leugner,
German.verse 56:53: und euch dann davon die Bäuche füllen
German.verse 56:54: und dann darauf heißes Wasser trinken;
German.verse 56:55: trinken werdet ihr dann, wie ewig Durstige trinken.
German.verse 56:56: Das ist ihre gastliche Aufnahme am Tag des Gerichts.
German.verse 56:57: Wir doch haben euch erschaffen; wenn ihr (es) doch für wahr halten würdet!
German.verse 56:58: Was meint ihr denn zu dem, was ihr als Samen ausspritzt?
German.verse 56:59: Seid ihr es etwa, die ihn erschaffen oder sind nicht doch Wir die Erschaffer?
German.verse 56:60: Wir doch haben unter euch den Tod festgelegt. Und niemand kann Uns zuvorkommen,
German.verse 56:61: daß Wir (nicht) euresgleichen (gegen euch) austauschen und euch (in einem Zustand wieder)entstehen lassen, den ihr nicht kennt.
German.verse 56:62: Und ihr kennt doch die erste Schöpfung. Wenn ihr doch bedenken würdet!
German.verse 56:63: Was meint ihr denn zu dem, was ihr an Saatfeldern bestellt?
German.verse 56:64: Seid ihr es etwa, die es wachsen lassen, oder sind nicht doch Wir es, die wachsen lassen?
German.verse 56:65: Wenn Wir wollten, könnten Wir es wahrlich zu zermalmtem Zeug machen, und ihr würdet dann dauernd verwundert darüber reden:
German.verse 56:67: Nein! Vielmehr ist uns alles verwehrt worden."
German.verse 56:68: Was meint ihr denn zu dem Wasser, das ihr trinkt?
German.verse 56:69: Seid ihr es etwa, die es von den Wolken herabkommen lassen, oder sind doch nicht Wir es, die herabkommen lassen?
German.verse 56:70: Wenn Wir wollten, könnten Wir es (auf der Zunge) brennend machen. Wenn ihr doch dankbar sein würdet!
German.verse 56:71: Was meint ihr denn zu dem Feuer, das ihr (durch Reiben) zündet?
German.verse 56:72: Seid ihr es etwa, die den dazu nötigen Baum entstehen lassen, oder sind nicht doch Wir es, die entstehen lassen?
German.verse 56:73: Wir haben es ja zur Erinnerung (an das Höllenfeuer) und als Nießbrauch für die Wanderer gemacht.
German.verse 56:74: Darum preise den Namen deines Allgewaltigen Herrn.
German.verse 56:75: Nein! Ich schwöre bei den Standorten der Sterne
German.verse 56:76: - und das ist wahrlich, wenn ihr (nur) wüßtet, ein gewaltiger Schwur:
German.verse 56:77: Das ist wahrlich ein ehrwürdiger Qur'an
German.verse 56:79: das nur diejenigen berühren (dürfen), die vollkommen gereinigt sind;
German.verse 56:80: (er ist) eine Offenbarung vom Herrn der Weltenbewohner.
German.verse 56:81: Wollt ihr denn über diese Aussage nur schön reden
German.verse 56:82: und (als Dankbarkeit) für eure Versorgung soll euer Ableugnen sein?
German.verse 56:85: und Wir ihm näher sind als ihr - aber ihr könnt es nicht sehen -,
German.verse 56:86: könntet ihr dann, wenn ihr doch nicht vor Gericht gestellt werden sollt (, wie ihr behauptet),
German.verse 56:87: sie zurückbringen, wenn ihr wahrhaftig seid?
German.verse 56:88: Wenn er nun zu den (Allah) Nahegestellten gehört,
German.verse 56:89: dann (wird es für ihn) Ruhe, duftende Pflanzen und einen Garten der Wonne (geben).
German.verse 56:90: Und wenn er nun zu den Gefährten der rechten Seite gehört,
German.verse 56:91: so: Friede sei dir von den Gefährten der rechten Seite.
German.verse 56:92: Wenn er aber zu den Leugnern, den Irregehenden gehört,
German.verse 56:93: dann wird ihm eine gastliche Aufnahme aus heißem Wasser (zuteil) werden,
German.verse 56:95: Dies ist wahrlich die reine Gewißheit.
German.verse 56:96: Darum preise den Namen deines Allgewaltigen Herrn.

Hausa.verse 56:2: Bãbu wani (rai) mai ƙaryatãwa ga aukuwarta.
Hausa.verse 56:6: Sai suka kasance ƙũra da ake wãtsarwa.
Hausa.verse 56:8: Watau mazõwa dãma. Mẽne ne mazõwa dãma?
Hausa.verse 56:9: Da mazõwa hagu. Mẽne ne mazõwa hagu?
Hausa.verse 56:10: Da waɗanda suka tsẽre. Sũ wɗanda suka tsẽren nan,
Hausa.verse 56:11: Waɗancan, sũ ne waɗanda aka kusantar.
Hausa.verse 56:16: Sunã gincire a kansu, sunã mãsu kallon jũna.
Hausa.verse 56:17: Wasu yara samãri na dindindin gẽwaya a kansu.
Hausa.verse 56:18: Da wasu kõfuna da shantula da hinjãlai daga (giya) mai ɓuɓɓuga.
Hausa.verse 56:19: Bã a sanya musu cĩwon jirĩ sabõda ita, kuma bã su buguwa.
Hausa.verse 56:20: Da wasu 'ya'yan itãcen marmari daga irin waɗanda suke zãɓe.
Hausa.verse 56:21: Da nãman tsuntsãye daga wanda suke ganin sha'awa.
Hausa.verse 56:22: Da wasu mãtã mãsu fararen idanu da girmansu.
Hausa.verse 56:23: Kamar misãlan lu'ulu'u wanda aka ɓõye.
Hausa.verse 56:24: A kan sakamakon, dõmin abin da suka kasance sunã aikatãwa.
Hausa.verse 56:25: Bã su jin wata yãsassar magana a cikinta, kuma bã su jin sun yi laifi.
Hausa.verse 56:26: Sai dai wata magana (mai dãɗi): Salãmun, Salãmun.
Hausa.verse 56:27: Da mazõwa dãma. Mẽne ne mazõwa dãma?
Hausa.verse 56:28: (Sunã) a cikin itãcen magarya maras ƙaya.
Hausa.verse 56:32: Da wasu 'ya'yan itacen marmari mãsu yawa.
Hausa.verse 56:33: Bã su yankẽwa kuma bã a hana su.
Hausa.verse 56:35: Lalle Mũ, Mun ƙãga halittarsu ƙãgãwa.
Hausa.verse 56:36: Sa'an nan Muka sanya su budurwai.
Hausa.verse 56:37: Mãsu son mazansu, a cikin tsãrã ɗaya.
Hausa.verse 56:39: Wata ƙungiya ce daga mutãnen farko.
Hausa.verse 56:40: Da wata ƙungiya daga mutãnen ƙarshe.
Hausa.verse 56:41: Mazõwa hagu, Mẽne ne mazõwa hagu?
Hausa.verse 56:42: Sunã a cikin wata iskar zãfi da wani ruwan zãfi.
Hausa.verse 56:43: Da wata inuwa ta hayãƙi mai baƙi.
Hausa.verse 56:44: Bã mai sanyi ba, kuma bã mai wata ni'ima ba.
Hausa.verse 56:45: Lalle sũ, sun kasance a gabãnin wannan waɗanda aka jiyar dãɗi.
Hausa.verse 56:46: Kuma sun kasance sunã dõgẽwa a kan mummũnan zunubi mai girma.
Hausa.verse 56:47: Kuma sun kasance sunã cẽwa: "Shin idan mun mutukuma muko kasance turɓãya da ƙasũsuwa shin lalle mũ waɗanda zã a kõma rãyarwa ne haƙĩƙatan?"
Hausa.verse 56:49: Ka ce: "Lalle mutãnen farko da na ƙarshe."
Hausa.verse 56:50: "Tabbas, waɗanda ake tãrãwa ne a cikin wani yini sananne."
Hausa.verse 56:51: "Sa'an nan lalle ku, ya kũ ɓatattu, mãsu ƙaryatãwa!"
Hausa.verse 56:52: "Lalle mãsu cĩ ne daga wata itãciya ta zaƙƙum (ɗanyen wutã)."
Hausa.verse 56:53: "Har za ku zama mãsu cika cikunna daga gare ta."
Hausa.verse 56:54: "Sa'an nan kuma mãsu shã ne, a kan wannan abin cin, daga ruwan zãfi."
Hausa.verse 56:55: "Ku zama mãsu shã irin shan rãƙuma mãsu ƙishirwa."
Hausa.verse 56:56: Wannan ita ce liyãfarsu a rãnar sakamako.
Hausa.verse 56:57: Mũ ne Muka halitta ku, to, don me bã zã ku gaskata ba?
Hausa.verse 56:58: Shin kuma kun ga abin da kuke fitarwa na maniyyi?
